4 1 the son of judah pharez hezron and carmi and hur and shobal 

4 2 and reaiah the son of shobal begat jahath and jahath begat 
ahumai and lahad these are the famili of the zorathit 

4 3 and these were of the father of etam jezreel and ishma and 
idbash and the name of their sister wa hazelelponi 4 4 and penuel 
the father of gedor and ezer the father of hushah these are the son 
of hur the firstborn of ephratah the father of bethlehem 

4 5 and ashur the father of tekoa had two wife helah and naarah 

4 6 and naarah bare him ahuzam and hepher and temeni and 
haahashtari 

these were the son of naarah 

4 7 and the son of helah were zereth and jezoar and ethnan 

4 8 and coz begat anub and zobebah and the famili of aharhel the 
son of harum 

4 9 and jabez wa more honour than hi brother and hi mother 
call hi name jabez say becau i bare him with sorrow 

4 10 and jabez call on the god of israel say oh that thou 
wouldest bless me ind and enlarg my coast and that thine hand 
might be with me and that thou wouldest keep me from evil that it 
may not griev me and god grant him that which he request 

4 11 and chelub the brother of shuah begat mehir which wa the father 
of eshton 

4 12 and eshton begat bethrapha and paseah and tehinnah the father 
of irnahash these are the men of rechah 

4 13 and the son of kenaz othniel and seraiah and the son of 
othniel hathath 

4 14 and meonothai begat ophrah and seraiah begat joab the father of 
the valley of charashim for they were craftsman 

4 15 and the son of caleb the son of jephunneh iru elah and naam 
and the son of elah even kenaz 

4 16 and the son of jehaleleel ziph and ziphah tiria and asareel 

4 17 and the son of ezra were jether and mere and epher and 
jalon and she bare miriam and shammai and ishbah the father of 
eshtemoa 

4 18 and hi wife jehudijah bare jere the father of gedor and heber 
the father of socho and jekuthiel the father of zanoah and these are 
the son of bithiah the daughter of pharaoh which mere took 

4 19 and the son of hi wife hodiah the sister of naham the father 
of keilah the garmit and eshtemoa the maachathit 

4 20 and the son of shimon were amnon and rinnah benhanan and 
tilon 

and the son of ishi were zoheth and benzoheth 

4 21 the son of shelah the son of judah were er the father of lecah 
and laadah the father of mareshah and the famili of the hou of 
them that wrought fine linen of the hou of ashbea 4 22 and jokim 
and the men of chozeba and joash and saraph who had the dominion in 
moab and jashubilehem and these are ancient thing 

4 23 these were the potter and those that dwelt among plant and 
hedg there they dwelt with the king for hi work 

4 24 the son of simeon were nemuel and jamin jarib zerah and 
shaul 4 25 shallum hi son mibsam hi son mishma hi son 

4 26 and the son of mishma hamuel hi son zacchur hi son shimei 
hi son 

4 27 and shimei had sixteen son and six daughter but hi brother 
had not mani child neither did all their famili multipli like to 
the child of judah 

4 28 and they dwelt at beersheba and moladah and hazarshu 4 29 
and at bilhah and at ezem and at tolad 4 30 and at bethuel and at 
hormah and at ziklag 4 31 and at bethmarcaboth and hazarsusim and 
at bethbirei and at shaaraim these were their citi unto the reign 
of david 

4 32 and their villag were etam and ain rimmon and tochen and 
ashan five citi 4 33 and all their villag that were round about 
the same citi unto baal these were their habit and their 
genealog 

4 34 and meshobab and jamlech and joshah the son of amaziah 4 35 
and joel and jehu the son of josibiah the son of seraiah the son of 
asiel 4 36 and elioenai and jaakobah and jeshohaiah and asaiah 
and adiel and jesimiel and benaiah 4 37 and ziza the son of shiphi 
the son of allon the son of jedaiah the son of shimri the son of 
shemaiah 4 38 these mention by their name were princ in their 
famili and the hou of their father increa greatli 

4 39 and they went to the entranc of gedor even unto the east side 
of the valley to seek pastur for their flock 

4 40 and they found fat pastur and good and the land wa wide and 
quiet and peaceabl for they of ham had dwelt there of old 

4 41 and these written by name came in the day of hezekiah king of 
judah and smote their tent and the habit that were found 
there and destroy them utterli unto thi day and dwelt in their 
room becau there wa pastur there for their flock 

4 42 and some of them even of the son of simeon five hundr men 
went to mount seir have for their captain pelatiah and neariah 
and rephaiah and uzziel the son of ishi 

4 43 and they smote the rest of the amalekit that were escap and 
dwelt there unto thi day 

5 1 now the son of reuben the firstborn of israel for he wa the 
firstborn but forasmuch a he defil hi father s bed hi 
birthright wa given unto the son of joseph the son of israel and 
the genealog is not to be reckon after the birthright 

5 2 for judah prevail abov hi brother and of him came the chief 
ruler but the birthright wa joseph s 5 3 the son i say of 
reuben the firstborn of israel were hanoch and pallu hezron and 
carmi 

5 4 the son of joel shemaiah hi son gog hi son shimei hi son 
5 5 micah hi son reaia hi son baal hi son 5 6 beerah hi son 
whom tilgathpiln king of assyria carri away captiv he wa 
princ of the reubenit 

5 7 and hi brother by their famili when the genealog of their 
gener wa reckon were the chief jeiel and zechariah 5 8 
and bela the son of azaz the son of shema the son of joel who dwelt 
in aroer even unto nebo and baalmeon 5 9 and eastward he inhabit 
unto the enter in of the wilder from the river euphrat 
becau their cattl were multipli in the land of gilead 

5 10 and in the day of saul they made war with the hagarit who 
fell by their hand and they dwelt in their tent throughout all the 
east land of gilead 

5 11 and the child of gad dwelt over against them in the land of 
bashan unto salcah 5 12 joel the chief and shapham the next and 
jaanai and shaphat in bashan 

5 13 and their brother of the hou of their father were michael 
and meshullam and sheba and jorai and jachan and zia and heber 
seven 

5 14 these are the child of abihail the son of huri the son of 
jaroah the son of gilead the son of michael the son of jeshishai 
the son of jahdo the son of buz 5 15 ahi the son of abdiel the son 
of guni chief of the hou of their father 

5 16 and they dwelt in gilead in bashan and in her town and in all 
the suburb of sharon upon their border 

5 17 all these were reckon by genealog in the day of jotham king 
of judah and in the day of jeroboam king of israel 

5 18 the son of reuben and the gadit and half the tribe of 
manasseh of valiant men men abl to bear buckler and sword and to 
shoot with bow and skil in war were four and forti thousand seven 
hundr and threescor that went out to the war 

5 19 and they made war with the hagarit with jetur and nephish 
and nodab 

5 20 and they were help against them and the hagarit were 
deliv into their hand and all that were with them for they cri 
to god in the battl and he wa intreat of them becau they put 
their trust in him 

5 21 and they took away their cattl of their camel fifti thousand 
and of sheep two hundr and fifti thousand and of as two 
thousand and of men an hundr thousand 

5 22 for there fell down mani slain becau the war wa of god and 
they dwelt in their stead until the captiv 

5 23 and the child of the half tribe of manasseh dwelt in the land 
they increa from bashan unto baalhermon and senir and unto mount 
hermon 

5 24 and these were the head of the hou of their father even 
epher and ishi and eliel and azriel and jeremiah and hodaviah 
and jahdiel mighti men of valour famou men and head of the hou 
of their father 

5 25 and they transgress against the god of their father and went 
a whore after the god of the peopl of the land whom god destroy 
befor them 

5 26 and the god of israel stir up the spirit of pul king of 
assyria and the spirit of tilgathpiln king of assyria and he 
carri them away even the reubenit and the gadit and the half 
tribe of manasseh and brought them unto halah and habor and hara 
and to the river gozan unto thi day

also of aaron nadab and abihu eleazar and ithamar

ahitub 6 8 and ahitub begat zadok and zadok begat ahimaaz 6 9 and

templ that solomon built in jerusalem 6 11 and azariah begat 
amariah and amariah begat ahitub 6 12 and ahitub begat zadok and

6 54 now these are their dwell place throughout their castl in 
their coast of the son of aaron of the famili of the kohathit 
for their wa the lot

thereof round about it 

6 56 but the field of the citi and the villag thereof they gave 
to caleb the son of jephunneh 

6 57 and to the son of aaron they gave the citi of judah name 
hebron the citi of refug and libnah with her suburb and jattir 
and eshtemoa with their suburb 6 58 and hilen with her suburb 
debir with her suburb 6 59 and ashan with her suburb and 
bethshemesh with her suburb 6 60 and out of the tribe of benjamin 
geba with her suburb and alemeth with her suburb and anathoth with 
her suburb all their citi throughout their famili were thirteen 
citi 

6 61 and unto the son of kohath which were left of the famili of 
that tribe were citi given out of the half tribe name out of 
the half tribe of manasseh by lot ten citi 

6 62 and to the son of gershom throughout their famili out of the 
tribe of issachar and out of the tribe of asher and out of the tribe 
of naphtali and out of the tribe of manasseh in bashan thirteen 
citi 

6 63 unto the son of merari were given by lot throughout their 
famili out of the tribe of reuben and out of the tribe of gad and 
out of the tribe of zebulun twelv citi 

6 64 and the child of israel gave to the levit these citi with 
their suburb 

6 65 and they gave by lot out of the tribe of the child of judah 
and out of the tribe of the child of simeon and out of the tribe 
of the child of benjamin these citi which are call by their 
name 

6 66 and the residu of the famili of the son of kohath had citi 
of their coast out of the tribe of ephraim 

6 67 and they gave unto them of the citi of refug shechem in 
mount ephraim with her suburb they gave also gezer with her suburb 
6 68 and jokmeam with her suburb and bethhoron with her suburb 
6 69 and aijalon with her suburb and gathrimmon with her suburb 
6 70 and out of the half tribe of manasseh aner with her suburb and 
bileam with her suburb for the famili of the remnant of the son of 
kohath

tribe of manasseh golan in bashan with her suburb and ashtaroth 
with her suburb 6 72 and out of the tribe of issachar kedesh with 
her suburb daberath with her suburb 6 73 and ramoth with her 
suburb and anem with her suburb 6 74 and out of the tribe of 
asher mashal with her suburb and abdon with her suburb 6 75 and

tribe of zebulun rimmon with her suburb tabor with her suburb 
6 78 and on the other side jordan by jericho on the east side of

wilder with her suburb and jahzah with her suburb 6 79

7 1 now the son of issachar were tola and puah jashub and 
shimrom four 

7 2 and the son of tola uzzi and rephaiah and jeriel and jahmai 
and jibsam and shemuel head of their father s hou to wit of 
tola they were valiant men of might in their gener whose 
number wa in the day of david two and twenti thousand and six 
hundr 

7 3 and the son of uzzi izrahiah and the son of izrahiah michael 
and obadiah and joel ishiah five all of them chief men 

7 4 and with them by their gener after the hou of their 
father were band of soldier for war six and thirti thousand men 
for they had mani wife and son 

7 5 and their brother among all the famili of issachar were valiant 
men of might reckon in all by their genealog fourscor and seven 
thousand 

7 6 the son of benjamin bela and becher and jediael three 

7 7 and the son of bela ezbon and uzzi and uzziel and jerimoth 
and iri five head of the hou of their father mighti men of 
valour and were reckon by their genealog twenti and two thousand 
and thirti and four 

7 8 and the son of becher zemira and joash and eliez and 
elioenai and omri and jerimoth and abiah and anathoth and 
alameth all these are the son of becher 

7 9 and the number of them after their genealog by their 
gener head of the hou of their father mighti men of 
valour wa twenti thousand and two hundr 

7 10 the son also of jediael bilhan and the son of bilhan jeush 
and benjamin and ehud and chenaanah and zethan and tharshish and 
ahishahar 

7 11 all these the son of jediael by the head of their father 
mighti men of valour were seventeen thousand and two hundr 
soldier fit to go out for war and battl 

7 12 shuppim also and huppim the child of ir and hushim the 
son of aher 

7 13 the son of naphtali jahziel and guni and jezer and shallum 
the son of bilhah 

7 14 the son of manasseh ashriel whom she bare but hi concubin 
the aramitess bare machir the father of gilead 7 15 and machir took 
to wife the sister of huppim and shuppim whose sister s name wa 
maachah and the name of the second wa zelophehad and zelophehad 
had daughter 

7 16 and maachah the wife of machir bare a son and she call hi 
name peresh and the name of hi brother wa sheresh and hi son 
were ulam and rakem 

7 17 and the son of ulam bedan these were the son of gilead the 
son of machir the son of manasseh 

7 18 and hi sister hammoleketh bare ishod and abiez and mahalah 

7 19 and the son of shemidah were ahian and shechem and likhi and 
aniam 

7 20 and the son of ephraim shuthelah and bere hi son and tahath 
hi son and eladah hi son and tahath hi son 7 21 and zabad hi 
son and shuthelah hi son and ezer and elead whom the men of gath 
that were born in that land slew becau they came down to take away 
their cattl 

7 22 and ephraim their father mourn mani day and hi brother came 
to comfort him 

7 23 and when he went in to hi wife she conceiv and bare a son 
and he call hi name beriah becau it went evil with hi hou 

7 24 and hi daughter wa sherah who built bethhoron the nether and 
the upper and uzzensherah 7 25 and rephah wa hi son also 
resheph and telah hi son and tahan hi son 

7 26 laadan hi son ammihud hi son elishama hi son 

7 27 non hi son jehoshuah hi son 

7 28 and their poss and habit were bethel and the town 
thereof and eastward naaran and westward gezer with the town 
thereof shechem also and the town thereof unto gaza and the town 
thereof 7 29 and by the border of the child of manasseh 
bethshean and her town taanach and her town megiddo and her town 
dor and her town in these dwelt the child of joseph the son of 
israel 

7 30 the son of asher imnah and isuah and ishuai and beriah and 
serah their sister 

7 31 and the son of beriah heber and malchiel who is the father of 
birzavith 

7 32 and heber begat japhlet and shomer and hotham and shua their 
sister 

7 33 and the son of japhlet pasach and bimhal and ashvath these 
are the child of japhlet 

7 34 and the son of shamer ahi and rohgah jehubbah and aram 

7 35 and the son of hi brother helem zophah and imna and shelesh 
and amal 

7 36 the son of zophah suah and harneph and shual and beri and 
imrah 7 37 bezer and hod and shamma and shilshah and ithran and 
beera 

7 38 and the son of jether jephunneh and pispah and ara 

7 39 and the son of ulla arah and haniel and rezia 

7 40 all these were the child of asher head of their father s 
hou choic and mighti men of valour chief of the princ and the 
number throughout the genealog of them that were apt to the war and 
to battl wa twenti and six thousand men 

8 1 now benjamin begat bela hi firstborn ashbel the second and 
aharah the third 8 2 nohah the fourth and rapha the fifth 

8 3 and the son of bela were addar and gera and abihud 8 4 and 
abishua and naaman and ahoah 8 5 and gera and shephuphan and 
huram 

8 6 and these are the son of ehud these are the head of the father 
of the inhabit of geba and they remov them to manahath 8 7 and 
naaman and ahiah and gera he remov them and begat uzza and 
ahihud 

8 8 and shaharaim begat child in the countri of moab after he had 
sent them away hushim and baara were hi wife 

8 9 and he begat of hodesh hi wife jobab and zibia and mesha and 
malcham 8 10 and jeuz and shachia and mirma these were hi son 
head of the father 

8 11 and of hushim he begat abitub and elpaal 

8 12 the son of elpaal eber and misham and shame who built ono 
and lod with the town thereof 8 13 beriah also and shema who were 
head of the father of the inhabit of aijalon who drove away the

the son of beriah 8 17 and zebadiah and meshullam and hezeki and 
heber 8 18 ishmerai also and jezliah and jobab the son of elpaal

and eliel 8 21 and adaiah and beraiah and shimrath the son of 
shimhi 8 22 and ishpan and heber and eliel 8 23 and abdon and

and shehariah and athaliah 8 27 and jaresiah and eliah and zichri 
the son of jeroham 

8 28 these were head of the father by their gener chief men 

these dwelt in jerusalem 

8 29 and at gibeon dwelt the father of gibeon whose wife s name wa 
maachah 8 30 and hi firstborn son abdon and zur and kish and 
baal and nadab 8 31 and gedor and ahio and zacher 

8 32 and mikloth begat shimeah and these also dwelt with their 
brother in jerusalem over against them 

8 33 and ner begat kish and kish begat saul and saul begat jonathan 
and malchishua and abinadab and eshbaal 

8 34 and the son of jonathan wa meribba and meribba begat micah 

8 35 and the son of micah were pithon and melech and tarea and 
ahaz 

8 36 and ahaz begat jehoadah and jehoadah begat alemeth and 
azmaveth and zimri and zimri begat moza 8 37 and moza begat binea 
rapha wa hi son eleasah hi son azel hi son 8 38 and azel had 
six son whose name are these azrikam bocheru and ishmael and 
sheariah and obadiah and hanan all these were the son of azel 

8 39 and the son of eshek hi brother were ulam hi firstborn 
jehush the second and eliphelet the third 

8 40 and the son of ulam were mighti men of valour archer and had 
mani son and son son an hundr and fifti all these are of the 
son of benjamin 

9 1 so all israel were reckon by genealog and behold they were 
written in the book of the king of israel and judah who were carri 
away to babylon for their transgress 

9 2 now the first inhabit that dwelt in their poss in their 
citi were the israelit the priest levit and the nethinim 

9 3 and in jerusalem dwelt of the child of judah and of the 
child of benjamin and of the child of ephraim and manasseh 
9 4 uthai the son of ammihud the son of omri the son of imri the 
son of ban of the child of pharez the son of judah 

9 5 and of the shilonit asaiah the firstborn and hi son 

9 6 and of the son of zerah jeuel and their brother six hundr 
and nineti 

9 7 and of the son of benjamin sallu the son of meshullam the son 
of hodaviah the son of hasenuah 9 8 and ibneiah the son of jeroham 
and elah the son of uzzi the son of michri and meshullam the son of 
shephathiah the son of reuel the son of ibnijah 9 9 and their 
brother accord to their gener nine hundr and fifti and 
six all these men were chief of the father in the hou of their 
father 

9 10 and of the priest jedaiah and jehoiarib and jachin 9 11 and 
azariah the son of hilkiah the son of meshullam the son of zadok 
the son of meraioth the son of ahitub the ruler of the hou of god 
9 12 and adaiah the son of jeroham the son of pashur the son of 
malchijah and maasiai the son of adiel the son of jahzerah the son 
of meshullam the son of meshillemith the son of immer 9 13 and 
their brother head of the hou of their father a thousand and 
seven hundr and threescor veri abl men for the work of the 
servic of the hou of god 

9 14 and of the levit shemaiah the son of hasshub the son of 
azrikam the son of hashabiah of the son of merari 9 15 and 
bakbakkar heresh and galal and mattaniah the son of micah the son 
of zichri the son of asaph 9 16 and obadiah the son of shemaiah the 
son of galal the son of jeduthun and berechiah the son of asa the 
son of elkanah that dwelt in the villag of the netophathit 

9 17 and the porter were shallum and akkub and talmon and ahiman 
and their brother shallum wa the chief 9 18 who hitherto wait in 
the king s gate eastward they were porter in the compani of the 
child of levi 

9 19 and shallum the son of kore the son of ebiasaph the son of 
korah and hi brother of the hou of hi father the korahit 
were over the work of the servic keeper of the gate of the 
tabernacl and their father be over the host of the lord were 
keeper of the entri 

9 20 and phineha the son of eleazar wa the ruler over them in time 
past and the lord wa with him 

9 21 and zechariah the son of meshelemiah wa porter of the door of 
the tabernacl of the congreg 

9 22 all these which were chosen to be porter in the gate were two 
hundr and twelv these were reckon by their genealog in their 
villag whom david and samuel the seer did ordain in their set 
offic 

9 23 so they and their child had the oversight of the gate of the 
hou of the lord name the hou of the tabernacl by ward 

9 24 in four quarter were the porter toward the east west north 
and south 

9 25 and their brother which were in their villag were to come 
after seven day from time to time with them 

9 26 for these levit the four chief porter were in their set 
offic and were over the chamber and treasuri of the hou of god 

9 27 and they lodg round about the hou of god becau the charg 
wa upon them and the open thereof everi morn pertain to 
them 

9 28 and certain of them had the charg of the minist vessel 
that they should bring them in and out by tale 

9 29 some of them also were appoint to overs the vessel and all 
the instrument of the sanctuari and the fine flour and the wine 
and the oil and the frankincen and the spice 

9 30 and some of the son of the priest made the ointment of the 
spice 

9 31 and mattithiah one of the levit who wa the firstborn of 
shallum the korahit had the set offic over the thing that were 
made in the pan 

9 32 and other of their brother of the son of the kohathit were 
over the shewbread to prepar it everi sabbath 

9 33 and these are the singer chief of the father of the levit 
who remain in the chamber were free for they were employ in 
that work day and night 

9 34 these chief father of the levit were chief throughout their 
gener these dwelt at jerusalem 

9 35 and in gibeon dwelt the father of gibeon jehiel whose wife s 
name wa maachah 9 36 and hi firstborn son abdon then zur and 
kish and baal and ner and nadab 

9 37 and gedor and ahio and zechariah and mikloth 

9 38 and mikloth begat shimeam and they also dwelt with their 
brother at jerusalem over against their brother 

9 39 and ner begat kish and kish begat saul and saul begat jonathan 
and malchishua and abinadab and eshbaal 

9 40 and the son of jonathan wa meribba and meribba begat micah 

9 41 and the son of micah were pithon and melech and tahrea and 
ahaz 

9 42 and ahaz begat jarah and jarah begat alemeth and azmaveth and 
zimri and zimri begat moza 9 43 and moza begat binea and rephaiah 
hi son eleasah hi son azel hi son 

9 44 and azel had six son whose name are these azrikam bocheru 
and ishmael and sheariah and obadiah and hanan these were the son 
of azel 

10 1 now the philistin fought against israel and the men of israel 
fled from befor the philistin and fell down slain in mount gilboa 

10 2 and the philistin follow hard after saul and after hi son 
and the philistin slew jonathan and abinadab and malchishua the 
son of saul 

10 3 and the battl went sore against saul and the archer hit him 
and he wa wound of the archer 

10 4 then said saul to hi armourbear draw thi sword and thrust me 
through therewith lest these uncircumci come and abu me but hi 
armourbear would not for he wa sore afraid so saul took a sword 
and fell upon it 

10 5 and when hi armourbear saw that saul wa dead he fell 
likewi on the sword and die 

10 6 so saul die and hi three son and all hi hou die 
togeth 

10 7 and when all the men of israel that were in the valley saw that 
they fled and that saul and hi son were dead then they forsook 
their citi and fled and the philistin came and dwelt in them 

10 8 and it came to pa on the morrow when the philistin came to 
strip the slain that they found saul and hi son fallen in mount 
gilboa 

10 9 and when they had strip him they took hi head and hi 
armour and sent into the land of the philistin round about to 
carri tide unto their idol and to the peopl 

10 10 and they put hi armour in the hou of their god and fasten 
hi head in the templ of dagon 

10 11 and when all jabeshgilead heard all that the philistin had 
done to saul 10 12 they aro all the valiant men and took away the 
bodi of saul and the bodi of hi son and brought them to jabesh 
and buri their bone under the oak in jabesh and fast seven day 

10 13 so saul die for hi transgress which he commit against 
the lord even against the word of the lord which he kept not and 
also for ask counsel of one that had a familiar spirit to enquir 
of it 10 14 and enquir not of the lord therefor he slew him and 
turn the kingdom unto david the son of jess 

11 1 then all israel gather themselv to david unto hebron say 
behold we are thi bone and thi flesh 

11 2 and moreov in time past even when saul wa king thou wast he 
that leddest out and broughtest in israel and the lord thi god said 
unto thee thou shalt feed my peopl israel and thou shalt be ruler 
over my peopl israel 

11 3 therefor came all the elder of israel to the king to hebron 
and david made a coven with them in hebron befor the lord and 
they anoint david king over israel accord to the word of the 
lord by samuel 

11 4 and david and all israel went to jerusalem which is jebu where 
the jebusit were the inhabit of the land 

11 5 and the inhabit of jebu said to david thou shalt not come 
hither nevertheless david took the castl of zion which is the citi 
of david 

11 6 and david said whosoev smiteth the jebusit first shall be 
chief and captain so joab the son of zeruiah went first up and wa 
chief 

11 7 and david dwelt in the castl therefor they call it the citi 
of david 

11 8 and he built the citi round about even from millo round about 
and joab repair the rest of the citi 

11 9 so david wax greater and greater for the lord of host wa 
with him 

11 10 these also are the chief of the mighti men whom david had who 
strengthen themselv with him in hi kingdom and with all israel 
to make him king accord to the word of the lord concern israel 

11 11 and thi is the number of the mighti men whom david had 
jashobeam an hachmonit the chief of the captain he lift up hi 
spear against three hundr slain by him at one time 

11 12 and after him wa eleazar the son of dodo the ahohit who wa 
one of the three mighti 

11 13 he wa with david at pasdammim and there the philistin were 
gather togeth to battl where wa a parcel of ground full of 
barley and the peopl fled from befor the philistin 

11 14 and they set themselv in the midst of that parcel and 
deliv it and slew the philistin and the lord save them by a 
great deliv 

11 15 now three of the thirti captain went down to the rock to david 
into the cave of adullam and the host of the philistin encamp in 
the valley of rephaim 

11 16 and david wa then in the hold and the philistin garrison 
wa then at bethlehem 

11 17 and david long and said oh that one would give me drink of 
the water of the well of bethlehem that is at the gate 11 18 and 
the three brake through the host of the philistin and drew water 
out of the well of bethlehem that wa by the gate and took it and 
brought it to david but david would not drink of it but pour it 
out to the lord 

11 19 and said my god forbid it me that i should do thi thing 
shall i drink the blood of these men that have put their life in 
jeopardi for with the jeopardi of their life they brought it 
therefor he would not drink it 

these thing did these three mightiest 

11 20 and abishai the brother of joab he wa chief of the three for 
lift up hi spear against three hundr he slew them and had a 
name among the three 

11 21 of the three he wa more honour than the two for he wa 
their captain howbeit he attain not to the first three 

11 22 benaiah the son of jehoiada the son of a valiant man of 
kabzeel who had done mani act he slew two lionlik men of moab 
also he went down and slew a lion in a pit in a snowi day 

11 23 and he slew an egyptian a man of great statur five cubit 
high and in the egyptian s hand wa a spear like a weaver s beam and 
he went down to him with a staff and pluck the spear out of the 
egyptian s hand and slew him with hi own spear 

11 24 these thing did benaiah the son of jehoiada and had the name 
among the three mighti 

11 25 behold he wa honour among the thirti but attain not to 
the first three and david set him over hi guard 

11 26 also the valiant men of the armi were asahel the brother of 
joab elhanan the son of dodo of bethlehem 11 27 shammoth the 
harorit helez the pelonit 11 28 ira the son of ikkesh the tekoit 
abiez the antothit 11 29 sibbecai the hushathit ilai the 
ahohit 11 30 maharai the netophathit hele the son of baanah the 
netophathit 11 31 ithai the son of ribai of gibeah that pertain 
to the child of benjamin benaiah the pirathonit 11 32 hurai of 
the brook of gaash abiel the arbathit 11 33 azmaveth the 
baharumit eliahba the shaalbonit 11 34 the son of hashem the 
gizonit jonathan the son of shage the hararit 11 35 ahiam the son 
of sacar the hararit eliph the son of ur 11 36 hepher the 
mecherathit ahijah the pelonit 11 37 hezro the carmelit naarai 
the son of ezbai 11 38 joel the brother of nathan mibhar the son of 
haggeri 11 39 zelek the ammonit naharai the berothit the 
armourbear of joab the son of zeruiah 11 40 ira the ithrit gareb 
the ithrit 11 41 uriah the hittit zabad the son of ahlai 11 42 
adina the son of shiza the reubenit a captain of the reubenit and 
thirti with him 11 43 hanan the son of maachah and joshaphat the 
mithnit 11 44 uzzia the ashterathit shama and jehiel the son of 
hothan the aroerit 11 45 jediael the son of shimri and joha hi 
brother the tizit 11 46 eliel the mahavit and jeribai and 
joshaviah the son of elnaam and ithmah the moabit 11 47 eliel 
and obe and jasiel the mesobait 

12 1 now these are they that came to david to ziklag while he yet 
kept himself close becau of saul the son of kish and they were 
among the mighti men helper of the war 

12 2 they were arm with bow and could use both the right hand and 
the left in hurl stone and shoot arrow out of a bow even of 
saul s brother of benjamin 

12 3 the chief wa ahiez then joash the son of shemaah the 
gibeathit and jeziel and pelet the son of azmaveth and berachah 
and jehu the antothit 

12 4 and ismaiah the gibeonit a mighti man among the thirti and 
over the thirti and jeremiah and jahaziel and johanan and josabad 
the gederathit 12 5 eluzai and jerimoth and bealiah and 
shemariah and shephatiah the haruphit 12 6 elkanah and jesiah and 
azareel and joezer and jashobeam the korhit 12 7 and joelah and 
zebadiah the son of jeroham of gedor 

12 8 and of the gadit there separ themselv unto david into the 
hold to the wilder men of might and men of war fit for the 
battl that could handl shield and buckler whose face were like 
the face of lion and were a swift a the roe upon the mountain 
12 9 ezer the first obadiah the second eliab the third 12 10 
mishmannah the fourth jeremiah the fifth 12 11 attai the sixth 
eliel the seventh 12 12 johanan the eighth elzabad the ninth 12 13 
jeremiah the tenth machbanai the eleventh 

12 14 these were of the son of gad captain of the host one of the 
least wa over an hundr and the greatest over a thousand 

12 15 these are they that went over jordan in the first month when it 
had overflown all hi bank and they put to flight all them of the 
valley both toward the east and toward the west 

12 16 and there came of the child of benjamin and judah to the hold 
unto david 

12 17 and david went out to meet them and answer and said unto 
them if ye be come peaceabl unto me to help me mine heart shall be 
knit unto you but if ye be come to betray me to mine enemi see 
there is no wrong in mine hand the god of our father look thereon 
and rebuk it 

12 18 then the spirit came upon amasai who wa chief of the captain 
and he said thine are we david and on thi side thou son of jess 
peac peac be unto thee and peac be to thine helper for thi god 
helpeth thee 

then david receiv them and made them captain of the band 

12 19 and there fell some of manasseh to david when he came with the 
philistin against saul to battl but they help them not for the 
lord of the philistin upon advi sent him away say he 
will fall to hi master saul to the jeopardi of our head 

12 20 a he went to ziklag there fell to him of manasseh adnah and 
jozabad and jediael and michael and jozabad and elihu and 
zilthai captain of the thousand that were of manasseh 

12 21 and they help david against the band of the rover for they 
were all mighti men of valour and were captain in the host 

12 22 for at that time day by day there came to david to help him 
until it wa a great host like the host of god 

12 23 and these are the number of the band that were readi arm to 
the war and came to david to hebron to turn the kingdom of saul to 
him accord to the word of the lord 

12 24 the child of judah that bare shield and spear were six 
thousand and eight hundr readi arm to the war 

12 25 of the child of simeon mighti men of valour for the war 
seven thousand and one hundr 

12 26 of the child of levi four thousand and six hundr 

12 27 and jehoiada wa the leader of the aaronit and with him were 
three thousand and seven hundr 12 28 and zadok a young man mighti 
of valour and of hi father s hou twenti and two captain 

12 29 and of the child of benjamin the kindr of saul three 
thousand for hitherto the greatest part of them had kept the ward of 
the hou of saul 

12 30 and of the child of ephraim twenti thousand and eight 
hundr mighti men of valour famou throughout the hou of their 
father 

12 31 and of the half tribe of manasseh eighteen thousand which were 
express by name to come and make david king 

12 32 and of the child of issachar which were men that had 
understand of the time to know what israel ought to do the head 
of them were two hundr and all their brother were at their 
command 

12 33 of zebulun such a went forth to battl expert in war with 
all instrument of war fifti thousand which could keep rank they 
were not of doubl heart 

12 34 and of naphtali a thousand captain and with them with shield 
and spear thirti and seven thousand 

12 35 and of the danit expert in war twenti and eight thousand and 
six hundr 

12 36 and of asher such a went forth to battl expert in war forti 
thousand 

12 37 and on the other side of jordan of the reubenit and the 
gadit and of the half tribe of manasseh with all manner of 
instrument of war for the battl an hundr and twenti thousand 

12 38 all these men of war that could keep rank came with a perfect 
heart to hebron to make david king over all israel and all the rest 
also of israel were of one heart to make david king 

12 39 and there they were with david three day eat and drink 
for their brother had prepar for them 

12 40 moreov they that were nigh them even unto issachar and 
zebulun and naphtali brought bread on as and on camel and on 
mule and on ox and meat meal cake of fig and bunch of 
raisin and wine and oil and ox and sheep abundantli for there 
wa joy in israel 

13 1 and david consult with the captain of thousand and hundr 
and with everi leader 

13 2 and david said unto all the congreg of israel if it seem 
good unto you and that it be of the lord our god let u send abroad 
unto our brother everi where that are left in all the land of 
israel and with them also to the priest and levit which are in 
their citi and suburb that they may gather themselv unto u 
13 3 and let u bring again the ark of our god to u for we enquir 
not at it in the day of saul 

13 4 and all the congreg said that they would do so for the 
thing wa right in the eye of all the peopl 

13 5 so david gather all israel togeth from shihor of egypt even 
unto the enter of hemath to bring the ark of god from 
kirjathjearim 

13 6 and david went up and all israel to baalah that is to 
kirjathjearim which belong to judah to bring up thenc the ark of 
god the lord that dwelleth between the cherub whose name is 
call on it 

13 7 and they carri the ark of god in a new cart out of the hou of 
abinadab and uzza and ahio drave the cart 

13 8 and david and all israel play befor god with all their might 
and with sing and with harp and with psalteri and with 
timbrel and with cymbal and with trumpet 

13 9 and when they came unto the threshingfloor of chidon uzza put 
forth hi hand to hold the ark for the ox stumbl 

13 10 and the anger of the lord wa kindl against uzza and he smote 
him becau he put hi hand to the ark and there he die befor god 

13 11 and david wa displea becau the lord had made a breach 
upon uzza wherefor that place is call perezuzza to thi day 

13 12 and david wa afraid of god that day say how shall i bring 
the ark of god home to me 13 13 so david brought not the ark home to 
himself to the citi of david but carri it asid into the hou of 
obededom the gittit 

13 14 and the ark of god remain with the famili of obededom in hi 
hou three month and the lord bless the hou of obededom and 
all that he had 

14 1 now hiram king of tyre sent messeng to david and timber of 
cedar with mason and carpent to build him an hou 

14 2 and david perceiv that the lord had confirm him king over 
israel for hi kingdom wa lift up on high becau of hi peopl 
israel 

14 3 and david took more wife at jerusalem and david begat more son 
and daughter 

14 4 now these are the name of hi child which he had in 
jerusalem shammua and shobab nathan and solomon 14 5 and ibhar 
and elishua and elpalet 14 6 and nogah and nepheg and japhia 14 7 
and elishama and beeliada and eliphalet 

14 8 and when the philistin heard that david wa anoint king over 
all israel all the philistin went up to seek david and david heard 
of it and went out against them 

14 9 and the philistin came and spread themselv in the valley of 
rephaim 

14 10 and david enquir of god say shall i go up against the 
philistin and wilt thou deliv them into mine hand and the lord 
said unto him go up for i will deliv them into thine hand 

14 11 so they came up to baalperazim and david smote them there then 
david said god hath broken in upon mine enemi by mine hand like the 
break forth of water therefor they call the name of that place 
baalperazim 

14 12 and when they had left their god there david gave a 
command and they were burn with fire 

14 13 and the philistin yet again spread themselv abroad in the 
valley 

14 14 therefor david enquir again of god and god said unto him go 
not up after them turn away from them and come upon them over 
against the mulberri tree 

14 15 and it shall be when thou shalt hear a sound of go in the 
top of the mulberri tree that then thou shalt go out to battl for 
god is gone forth befor thee to smite the host of the philistin 

14 16 david therefor did a god command him and they smote the 
host of the philistin from gibeon even to gazer 

14 17 and the fame of david went out into all land and the lord 
brought the fear of him upon all nation 

15 1 and david made him hou in the citi of david and prepar a 
place for the ark of god and pitch for it a tent 

15 2 then david said none ought to carri the ark of god but the 
levit for them hath the lord chosen to carri the ark of god and to 
minist unto him for ever 

15 3 and david gather all israel togeth to jerusalem to bring up 
the ark of the lord unto hi place which he had prepar for it 

15 4 and david assembl the child of aaron and the levit 15 5 
of the son of kohath uriel the chief and hi brother an hundr 
and twenti 15 6 of the son of merari asaiah the chief and hi 
brother two hundr and twenti 15 7 of the son of gershom joel the 
chief and hi brother an hundr and thirti 15 8 of the son of 
elizaphan shemaiah the chief and hi brother two hundr 15 9 of 
the son of hebron eliel the chief and hi brother fourscor 15 10 
of the son of uzziel amminadab the chief and hi brother an 
hundr and twelv 

15 11 and david call for zadok and abiathar the priest and for the 
levit for uriel asaiah and joel shemaiah and eliel and 
amminadab 15 12 and said unto them ye are the chief of the father 
of the levit sanctifi yourselv both ye and your brother that 
ye may bring up the ark of the lord god of israel unto the place that 
i have prepar for it 

15 13 for becau ye did it not at the first the lord our god made a 
breach upon u for that we sought him not after the due order 

15 14 so the priest and the levit sanctifi themselv to bring up 
the ark of the lord god of israel 

15 15 and the child of the levit bare the ark of god upon their 
shoulder with the stave thereon a mose command accord to the 
word of the lord 

15 16 and david spake to the chief of the levit to appoint their 
brother to be the singer with instrument of musick psalteri and 
harp and cymbal sound by lift up the voic with joy 

15 17 so the levit appoint heman the son of joel and of hi 
brother asaph the son of berechiah and of the son of merari their 
brother ethan the son of kushaiah 15 18 and with them their 
brother of the second degr zechariah ben and jaaziel and 
shemiramoth and jehiel and unni eliab and benaiah and maaseiah 
and mattithiah and elipheleh and mikneiah and obededom and jeiel 
the porter 

15 19 so the singer heman asaph and ethan were appoint to sound 
with cymbal of brass 15 20 and zechariah and aziel and 
shemiramoth and jehiel and unni and eliab and maaseiah and 
benaiah with psalteri on alamoth 15 21 and mattithiah and 
elipheleh and mikneiah and obededom and jeiel and azaziah with 
harp on the sheminith to excel 

15 22 and chenaniah chief of the levit wa for song he instruct 
about the song becau he wa skil 

15 23 and berechiah and elkanah were doorkeep for the ark 

15 24 and shebaniah and jehoshaphat and nethaneel and amasai and 
zechariah and benaiah and eliez the priest did blow with the 
trumpet befor the ark of god and obededom and jehiah were 
doorkeep for the ark 

15 25 so david and the elder of israel and the captain over 
thousand went to bring up the ark of the coven of the lord out of 
the hou of obededom with joy 

15 26 and it came to pa when god help the levit that bare the 
ark of the coven of the lord that they offer seven bullock and 
seven ram 

15 27 and david wa cloth with a robe of fine linen and all the 
levit that bare the ark and the singer and chenaniah the master 
of the song with the singer david also had upon him an ephod of 
linen 

15 28 thu all israel brought up the ark of the coven of the lord 
with shout and with sound of the cornet and with trumpet and 
with cymbal make a noi with psalteri and harp 

15 29 and it came to pa a the ark of the coven of the lord came 
to the citi of david that michal the daughter of saul look out at 
a window saw king david danc and play and she despi him in 
her heart 

16 1 so they brought the ark of god and set it in the midst of the 
tent that david had pitch for it and they offer burnt sacrif 
and peac offer befor god 

16 2 and when david had made an end of offer the burnt offer 
and the peac offer he bless the peopl in the name of the 
lord 

16 3 and he dealt to everi one of israel both man and woman to everi 
one a loaf of bread and a good piec of flesh and a flagon of wine 

16 4 and he appoint certain of the levit to minist befor the 
ark of the lord and to record and to thank and prai the lord god 
of israel 16 5 asaph the chief and next to him zechariah jeiel and 
shemiramoth and jehiel and mattithiah and eliab and benaiah and 
obededom and jeiel with psalteri and with harp but asaph made a 
sound with cymbal 16 6 benaiah also and jahaziel the priest with 
trumpet continu befor the ark of the coven of god 

16 7 then on that day david deliv first thi psalm to thank the 
lord into the hand of asaph and hi brother 

16 8 give thank unto the lord call upon hi name make known hi 
deed among the peopl 

16 9 sing unto him sing psalm unto him talk ye of all hi wondrou 
work 

16 10 glori ye in hi holi name let the heart of them rejoic that 
seek the lord 

16 11 seek the lord and hi strength seek hi face continu 

16 12 rememb hi marvel work that he hath done hi wonder 
and the judgment of hi mouth 16 13 o ye seed of israel hi servant 
ye child of jacob hi chosen one 

16 14 he is the lord our god hi judgment are in all the earth 

16 15 be ye mind alway of hi coven the word which he 
command to a thousand gener 16 16 even of the coven which 
he made with abraham and of hi oath unto isaac 16 17 and hath 
confirm the same to jacob for a law and to israel for an 
everlast coven 16 18 say unto thee will i give the land of 
canaan the lot of your inherit 16 19 when ye were but few even 
a few and stranger in it 

16 20 and when they went from nation to nation and from one kingdom 
to anoth peopl 16 21 he suffer no man to do them wrong yea he 
reprov king for their sake 16 22 say touch not mine anoint 
and do my prophet no harm 

16 23 sing unto the lord all the earth shew forth from day to day 
hi salvat 

16 24 declar hi glori among the heathen hi marvel work among 
all nation 

16 25 for great is the lord and greatli to be prai he also is to 
be fear abov all god 

16 26 for all the god of the peopl are idol but the lord made the 
heaven 

16 27 glori and honour are in hi presenc strength and glad are 
in hi place 

16 28 give unto the lord ye kindr of the peopl give unto the 
lord glori and strength 

16 29 give unto the lord the glori due unto hi name bring an 
offer and come befor him worship the lord in the beauti of 
holi 

16 30 fear befor him all the earth the world also shall be stabl 
that it be not move 

16 31 let the heaven be glad and let the earth rejoic and let men 
say among the nation the lord reigneth 

16 32 let the sea roar and the ful thereof let the field 
rejoic and all that is therein 

16 33 then shall the tree of the wood sing out at the presenc of the 
lord becau he cometh to judg the earth 

16 34 o give thank unto the lord for he is good for hi merci 
endureth for ever 

16 35 and say ye save u o god of our salvat and gather u 
togeth and deliv u from the heathen that we may give thank to 
thi holi name and glori in thi prai 

16 36 bless be the lord god of israel for ever and ever and all the 
peopl said amen and prai the lord 

16 37 so he left there befor the ark of the coven of the lord 
asaph and hi brother to minist befor the ark continu a 
everi day s work requir 16 38 and obededom with their brother 
threescor and eight obededom also the son of jeduthun and hosah to 
be porter 16 39 and zadok the priest and hi brother the priest 
befor the tabernacl of the lord in the high place that wa at 
gibeon 16 40 to offer burnt offer unto the lord upon the altar of 
the burnt offer continu morn and even and to do 
accord to all that is written in the law of the lord which he 
command israel 16 41 and with them heman and jeduthun and the rest 
that were chosen who were express by name to give thank to the 
lord becau hi merci endureth for ever 16 42 and with them heman 
and jeduthun with trumpet and cymbal for those that should make a 
sound and with music instrument of god and the son of jeduthun 
were porter 

16 43 and all the peopl depart everi man to hi hou and david 
return to bless hi hou 

17 1 now it came to pa a david sat in hi hou that david said 
to nathan the prophet lo i dwell in an hou of cedar but the ark 
of the coven of the lord remaineth under curtain 

17 2 then nathan said unto david do all that is in thine heart for 
god is with thee 

17 3 and it came to pa the same night that the word of god came to 
nathan say 17 4 go and tell david my servant thu saith the 
lord thou shalt not build me an hou to dwell in 17 5 for i have 
not dwelt in an hou sinc the day that i brought up israel unto thi 
day but have gone from tent to tent and from one tabernacl to 
anoth 

17 6 wheresoev i have walk with all israel spake i a word to ani 
of the judg of israel whom i command to feed my peopl say 
whi have ye not built me an hou of cedar 17 7 now therefor thu 
shalt thou say unto my servant david thu saith the lord of host i 
took thee from the sheepcot even from follow the sheep that thou 
shouldest be ruler over my peopl israel 17 8 and i have been with 
thee whithersoev thou hast walk and have cut off all thine 
enemi from befor thee and have made thee a name like the name of 
the great men that are in the earth 

17 9 also i will ordain a place for my peopl israel and will plant 
them and they shall dwell in their place and shall be move no more 
neither shall the child of wick wast them ani more a at 
the begin 17 10 and sinc the time that i command judg to be 
over my peopl israel moreov i will subdu all thine enemi 
furthermor i tell thee that the lord will build thee an hou 

17 11 and it shall come to pa when thi day be expir that thou 
must go to be with thi father that i will rai up thi seed after 
thee which shall be of thi son and i will establish hi kingdom 

17 12 he shall build me an hou and i will stablish hi throne for 
ever 

17 13 i will be hi father and he shall be my son and i will not 
take my merci away from him a i took it from him that wa befor 
thee 17 14 but i will settl him in mine hou and in my kingdom for 
ever and hi throne shall be establish for evermor 

17 15 accord to all these word and accord to all thi vision 
so did nathan speak unto david 

17 16 and david the king came and sat befor the lord and said who 
am i o lord god and what is mine hou that thou hast brought me 
hitherto 17 17 and yet thi wa a small thing in thine eye o god 
for thou hast also spoken of thi servant s hou for a great while to 
come and hast regard me accord to the estat of a man of high 
degr o lord god 

17 18 what can david speak more to thee for the honour of thi servant 
for thou knowest thi servant 

17 19 o lord for thi servant s sake and accord to thine own 
heart hast thou done all thi great in make known all these 
great thing 

17 20 o lord there is none like thee neither is there ani god besid 
thee accord to all that we have heard with our ear 

17 21 and what one nation in the earth is like thi peopl israel whom 
god went to redeem to be hi own peopl to make thee a name of 
great and terribl by drive out nation from befor thi 
peopl whom thou hast redeem out of egypt 17 22 for thi peopl 
israel didst thou make thine own peopl for ever and thou lord 
becamest their god 

17 23 therefor now lord let the thing that thou hast spoken 
concern thi servant and concern hi hou be establish for 
ever and do a thou hast said 

17 24 let it even be establish that thi name may be magnifi for 
ever say the lord of host is the god of israel even a god to 
israel and let the hou of david thi servant be establish befor 
thee 

17 25 for thou o my god hast told thi servant that thou wilt build 
him an hou therefor thi servant hath found in hi heart to pray 
befor thee 

17 26 and now lord thou art god and hast promi thi good 
unto thi servant 17 27 now therefor let it plea thee to bless the 
hou of thi servant that it may be befor thee for ever for thou 
blessest o lord and it shall be bless for ever 

18 1 now after thi it came to pa that david smote the philistin 
and subdu them and took gath and her town out of the hand of the 
philistin 

18 2 and he smote moab and the moabit becam david s servant and 
brought gift 

18 3 and david smote hadarez king of zobah unto hamath a he went 
to stablish hi dominion by the river euphrat 

18 4 and david took from him a thousand chariot and seven thousand 
horseman and twenti thousand footman david also hough all the 
chariot hor but reserv of them an hundr chariot 

18 5 and when the syrian of damascu came to help hadarez king of 
zobah david slew of the syrian two and twenti thousand men 

18 6 then david put garrison in syriadamascu and the syrian becam 
david s servant and brought gift thu the lord preserv david 
whithersoev he went 

18 7 and david took the shield of gold that were on the servant of 
hadarez and brought them to jerusalem 

18 8 likewi from tibhath and from chun citi of hadarez 
brought david veri much brass wherewith solomon made the brasen sea 
and the pillar and the vessel of brass 

18 9 now when tou king of hamath heard how david had smitten all the 
host of hadarez king of zobah 18 10 he sent hadoram hi son to king 
david to enquir of hi welfar and to congratul him becau he 
had fought against hadarez and smitten him for hadarez had war 
with tou and with him all manner of vessel of gold and silver and 
brass 

18 11 them also king david dedic unto the lord with the silver 
and the gold that he brought from all these nation from edom and 
from moab and from the child of ammon and from the philistin 
and from amalek 

18 12 moreov abishai the son of zeruiah slew of the edomit in the 
valley of salt eighteen thousand 

18 13 and he put garrison in edom and all the edomit becam 
david s servant thu the lord preserv david whithersoev he went 

18 14 so david reign over all israel and execut judgment and 
justic among all hi peopl 

18 15 and joab the son of zeruiah wa over the host and jehoshaphat 
the son of ahilud record 

18 16 and zadok the son of ahitub and abimelech the son of abiathar 
were the priest and shavsha wa scribe 18 17 and benaiah the son of 
jehoiada wa over the cherethit and the pelethit and the son of 
david were chief about the king 

19 1 now it came to pa after thi that nahash the king of the 
child of ammon die and hi son reign in hi stead 

19 2 and david said i will shew kind unto hanun the son of 
nahash becau hi father shew kind to me and david sent 
messeng to comfort him concern hi father so the servant of 
david came into the land of the child of ammon to hanun to comfort 
him 

19 3 but the princ of the child of ammon said to hanun thinkest 
thou that david doth honour thi father that he hath sent comfort 
unto thee are not hi servant come unto thee for to search and to 
overthrow and to spi out the land 19 4 wherefor hanun took david s 
servant and shave them and cut off their garment in the midst 
hard by their buttock and sent them away 

19 5 then there went certain and told david how the men were serv 
and he sent to meet them for the men were greatli asham and the 
king said tarri at jericho until your beard be grown and then 
return 

19 6 and when the child of ammon saw that they had made themselv 
odiou to david hanun and the child of ammon sent a thousand 
talent of silver to hire them chariot and horseman out of 
mesopotamia and out of syriamaachah and out of zobah 

19 7 so they hire thirti and two thousand chariot and the king of 
maachah and hi peopl who came and pitch befor medeba and the 
child of ammon gather themselv togeth from their citi and 
came to battl 

19 8 and when david heard of it he sent joab and all the host of the 
mighti men 

19 9 and the child of ammon came out and put the battl in array 
befor the gate of the citi and the king that were come were by 
themselv in the field 

19 10 now when joab saw that the battl wa set against him befor and 
behind he chose out of all the choic of israel and put them in 
array against the syrian 

19 11 and the rest of the peopl he deliv unto the hand of abishai 
hi brother and they set themselv in array against the child of 
ammon 

19 12 and he said if the syrian be too strong for me then thou 
shalt help me but if the child of ammon be too strong for thee 
then i will help thee 

19 13 be of good courag and let u behav ourselv valiantli for 
our peopl and for the citi of our god and let the lord do that 
which is good in hi sight 

19 14 so joab and the peopl that were with him drew nigh befor the 
syrian unto the battl and they fled befor him 

19 15 and when the child of ammon saw that the syrian were fled 
they likewi fled befor abishai hi brother and enter into the 
citi then joab came to jerusalem 

19 16 and when the syrian saw that they were put to the wor befor 
israel they sent messeng and drew forth the syrian that were 
beyond the river and shophach the captain of the host of hadarez 
went befor them 

19 17 and it wa told david and he gather all israel and pa 
over jordan and came upon them and set the battl in array against 
them so when david had put the battl in array against the syrian 
they fought with him 

19 18 but the syrian fled befor israel and david slew of the 
syrian seven thousand men which fought in chariot and forti 
thousand footman and kill shophach the captain of the host 

19 19 and when the servant of hadarez saw that they were put to the 
wor befor israel they made peac with david and becam hi 
servant neither would the syrian help the child of ammon ani 
more 

20 1 and it came to pa that after the year wa expir at the time 
that king go out to battl joab led forth the power of the armi and 
wast the countri of the child of ammon and came and besieg 
rabbah but david tarri at jerusalem and joab smote rabbah and 
destroy it 

20 2 and david took the crown of their king from off hi head and 
found it to weigh a talent of gold and there were preciou stone in 
it and it wa set upon david s head and he brought also exceed 
much spoil out of the citi 

20 3 and he brought out the peopl that were in it and cut them with 
saw and with harrow of iron and with ax even so dealt david 
with all the citi of the child of ammon and david and all the 
peopl return to jerusalem 

20 4 and it came to pa after thi that there aro war at gezer 
with the philistin at which time sibbechai the hushathit slew 
sippai that wa of the child of the giant and they were subdu 

20 5 and there wa war again with the philistin and elhanan the son 
of jair slew lahmi the brother of goliath the gittit whose spear 
staff wa like a weaver s beam 

20 6 and yet again there wa war at gath where wa a man of great 
statur whose finger and toe were four and twenti six on each 
hand and six on each foot and he also wa the son of the giant 

20 7 but when he defi israel jonathan the son of shimea david s 
brother slew him 

20 8 these were born unto the giant in gath and they fell by the hand 
of david and by the hand of hi servant 

21 1 and satan stood up against israel and provok david to number 
israel 

21 2 and david said to joab and to the ruler of the peopl go 
number israel from beersheba even to dan and bring the number of them 
to me that i may know it 

21 3 and joab answer the lord make hi peopl an hundr time so 
mani more a they be but my lord the king are they not all my 
lord s servant whi then doth my lord requir thi thing whi will 
he be a cau of trespass to israel 21 4 nevertheless the king s 
word prevail against joab wherefor joab depart and went 
throughout all israel and came to jerusalem 

21 5 and joab gave the sum of the number of the peopl unto david and 
all they of israel were a thousand thousand and an hundr thousand 
men that drew sword and judah wa four hundr threescor and ten 
thousand men that drew sword 

21 6 but levi and benjamin count he not among them for the king s 
word wa abomin to joab 

21 7 and god wa displea with thi thing therefor he smote 
israel 

21 8 and david said unto god i have sin greatli becau i have 
done thi thing but now i beseech thee do away the iniqu of thi 
servant for i have done veri foolishli 

21 9 and the lord spake unto gad david s seer say 21 10 go and 
tell david say thu saith the lord i offer thee three thing 
choo thee one of them that i may do it unto thee 

21 11 so gad came to david and said unto him thu saith the lord 
choo thee 21 12 either three year famin or three month to be 
destroy befor thi foe while that the sword of thine enemi 
overtaketh thee or el three day the sword of the lord even the 
pestil in the land and the angel of the lord destroy 
throughout all the coast of israel now therefor advi thyself what 
word i shall bring again to him that sent me 

21 13 and david said unto gad i am in a great strait let me fall now 
into the hand of the lord for veri great are hi merci but let me 
not fall into the hand of man 

21 14 so the lord sent pestil upon israel and there fell of 
israel seventi thousand men 

21 15 and god sent an angel unto jerusalem to destroy it and a he 
wa destroy the lord beheld and he repent him of the evil and 
said to the angel that destroy it is enough stay now thine hand 
and the angel of the lord stood by the threshingfloor of ornan the 
jebusit 

21 16 and david lift up hi eye and saw the angel of the lord 
stand between the earth and the heaven have a drawn sword in hi 
hand stretch out over jerusalem then david and the elder of 
israel who were cloth in sackcloth fell upon their face 

21 17 and david said unto god is it not i that command the peopl 
to be number even i it is that have sin and done evil ind 
but a for these sheep what have they done let thine hand i pray 
thee o lord my god be on me and on my father s hou but not on 
thi peopl that they should be plagu 

21 18 then the angel of the lord command gad to say to david that 
david should go up and set up an altar unto the lord in the 
threshingfloor of ornan the jebusit 

21 19 and david went up at the say of gad which he spake in the 
name of the lord 

21 20 and ornan turn back and saw the angel and hi four son with 
him hid themselv now ornan wa thresh wheat 

21 21 and a david came to ornan ornan look and saw david and went 
out of the threshingfloor and bow himself to david with hi face to 
the ground 

21 22 then david said to ornan grant me the place of thi 
threshingfloor that i may build an altar therein unto the lord thou 
shalt grant it me for the full price that the plagu may be stay 
from the peopl 

21 23 and ornan said unto david take it to thee and let my lord the 
king do that which is good in hi eye lo i give thee the ox also 
for burnt offer and the thresh instrument for wood and the 
wheat for the meat offer i give it all 

21 24 and king david said to ornan nay but i will verili buy it for 
the full price for i will not take that which is thine for the lord 
nor offer burnt offer without cost 

21 25 so david gave to ornan for the place six hundr shekel of gold 
by weight 

21 26 and david built there an altar unto the lord and offer burnt 
offer and peac offer and call upon the lord and he 
answer him from heaven by fire upon the altar of burnt offer 

21 27 and the lord command the angel and he put up hi sword again 
into the sheath thereof 

21 28 at that time when david saw that the lord had answer him in 
the threshingfloor of ornan the jebusit then he sacrif there 

21 29 for the tabernacl of the lord which mose made in the 
wilder and the altar of the burnt offer were at that season 
in the high place at gibeon 

21 30 but david could not go befor it to enquir of god for he wa 
afraid becau of the sword of the angel of the lord 

22 1 then david said thi is the hou of the lord god and thi is 
the altar of the burnt offer for israel 

22 2 and david command to gather togeth the stranger that were in 
the land of israel and he set mason to hew wrought stone to build 
the hou of god 

22 3 and david prepar iron in abund for the nail for the door 
of the gate and for the join and brass in abund without 
weight 22 4 also cedar tree in abund for the zidonian and they 
of tyre brought much cedar wood to david 

22 5 and david said solomon my son is young and tender and the hou 
that is to be build for the lord must be exceed magnif of 
fame and of glori throughout all countri i will therefor now make 
prepar for it so david prepar abundantli befor hi death 

22 6 then he call for solomon hi son and charg him to build an 
hou for the lord god of israel 

22 7 and david said to solomon my son a for me it wa in my mind 
to build an hou unto the name of the lord my god 22 8 but the word 
of the lord came to me say thou hast shed blood abundantli and 
hast made great war thou shalt not build an hou unto my name 
becau thou hast shed much blood upon the earth in my sight 

22 9 behold a son shall be born to thee who shall be a man of rest 
and i will give him rest from all hi enemi round about for hi 
name shall be solomon and i will give peac and quiet unto israel 
in hi day 

22 10 he shall build an hou for my name and he shall be my son and 
i will be hi father and i will establish the throne of hi kingdom 
over israel for ever 

22 11 now my son the lord be with thee and prosper thou and build 
the hou of the lord thi god a he hath said of thee 

22 12 onli the lord give thee wisdom and understand and give thee 
charg concern israel that thou mayest keep the law of the lord 
thi god 

22 13 then shalt thou prosper if thou takest heed to fulfil the 
statut and judgment which the lord charg mose with concern 
israel be strong and of good courag dread not nor be dismay 

22 14 now behold in my troubl i have prepar for the hou of the 
lord an hundr thousand talent of gold and a thousand thousand 
talent of silver and of brass and iron without weight for it is in 
abund timber also and stone have i prepar and thou mayest add 
thereto 

22 15 moreov there are workman with thee in abund hewer and 
worker of stone and timber and all manner of cun men for everi 
manner of work 

22 16 of the gold the silver and the brass and the iron there is 
no number ari therefor and be do and the lord be with thee 

22 17 david also command all the princ of israel to help solomon 
hi son say 22 18 is not the lord your god with you and hath he 
not given you rest on everi side for he hath given the inhabit of 
the land into mine hand and the land is subdu befor the lord and 
befor hi peopl 

22 19 now set your heart and your soul to seek the lord your god 
ari therefor and build ye the sanctuari of the lord god to bring 
the ark of the coven of the lord and the holi vessel of god into 
the hou that is to be built to the name of the lord 

23 1 so when david wa old and full of day he made solomon hi son 
king over israel 

23 2 and he gather togeth all the princ of israel with the 
priest and the levit 

23 3 now the levit were number from the age of thirti year and 
upward and their number by their poll man by man wa thirti and 
eight thousand 

23 4 of which twenti and four thousand were to set forward the work 
of the hou of the lord and six thousand were offic and judg 
23 5 moreov four thousand were porter and four thousand prai 
the lord with the instrument which i made said david to prai 
therewith 

23 6 and david divid them into cour among the son of levi 
name gershon kohath and merari 

23 7 of the gershonit were laadan and shimei 

23 8 the son of laadan the chief wa jehiel and zetham and joel 
three 

23 9 the son of shimei shelomith and haziel and haran three 
these were the chief of the father of laadan 

23 10 and the son of shimei were jahath zina and jeush and 
beriah 

these four were the son of shimei 

23 11 and jahath wa the chief and zizah the second but jeush and 
beriah had not mani son therefor they were in one reckon 
accord to their father s hou 

23 12 the son of kohath amram izhar hebron and uzziel four 

23 13 the son of amram aaron and mose and aaron wa separ 
that he should sanctifi the most holi thing he and hi son for 
ever to burn incen befor the lord to minist unto him and to 
bless in hi name for ever 

23 14 now concern mose the man of god hi son were name of the 
tribe of levi 

23 15 the son of mose were gershom and eliez 

23 16 of the son of gershom shebuel wa the chief 

23 17 and the son of eliez were rehabiah the chief and eliez 
had none other son but the son of rehabiah were veri mani 

23 18 of the son of izhar shelomith the chief 

23 19 of the son of hebron jeriah the first amariah the second 
jahaziel the third and jekameam the fourth 

23 20 of the son of uzziel micah the first and jesiah the second 

23 21 the son of merari mahli and mushi the son of mahli 
eleazar and kish 

23 22 and eleazar die and had no son but daughter and their 
brother the son of kish took them 

23 23 the son of mushi mahli and eder and jeremoth three 

23 24 these were the son of levi after the hou of their father 
even the chief of the father a they were count by number of name 
by their poll that did the work for the servic of the hou of the 
lord from the age of twenti year and upward 

23 25 for david said the lord god of israel hath given rest unto hi 
peopl that they may dwell in jerusalem for ever 23 26 and also unto 
the levit they shall no more carri the tabernacl nor ani vessel 
of it for the servic thereof 

23 27 for by the last word of david the levit were number from 
twenti year old and abov 23 28 becau their offic wa to wait on 
the son of aaron for the servic of the hou of the lord in the 
court and in the chamber and in the purifi of all holi thing 
and the work of the servic of the hou of god 23 29 both for the 
shewbread and for the fine flour for meat offer and for the 
unleaven cake and for that which is bake in the pan and for that 
which is fri and for all manner of measur and size 23 30 and to 
stand everi morn to thank and prai the lord and likewi at 
even 23 31 and to offer all burnt sacrif unto the lord in the 
sabbath in the new moon and on the set feast by number 
accord to the order command unto them continu befor the 
lord 23 32 and that they should keep the charg of the tabernacl of 
the congreg and the charg of the holi place and the charg of 
the son of aaron their brother in the servic of the hou of the 
lord 

24 1 now these are the divi of the son of aaron the son of 
aaron nadab and abihu eleazar and ithamar 

24 2 but nadab and abihu die befor their father and had no 
child therefor eleazar and ithamar execut the priest s offic 

24 3 and david distribut them both zadok of the son of eleazar 
and ahimelech of the son of ithamar accord to their offic in 
their servic 

24 4 and there were more chief men found of the son of eleazar than 
of the son of ithamar and thu were they divid among the son of 
eleazar there were sixteen chief men of the hou of their father 
and eight among the son of ithamar accord to the hou of their 
father 

24 5 thu were they divid by lot one sort with anoth for the 
governor of the sanctuari and governor of the hou of god were of 
the son of eleazar and of the son of ithamar 

24 6 and shemaiah the son of nethaneel the scribe one of the levit 
wrote them befor the king and the princ and zadok the priest and 
ahimelech the son of abiathar and befor the chief of the father of 
the priest and levit one princip household be taken for 
eleazar and one taken for ithamar 

24 7 now the first lot came forth to jehoiarib the second to jedaiah 
24 8 the third to harim the fourth to seorim 24 9 the fifth to 
malchijah the sixth to mijamin 24 10 the seventh to hakkoz the 
eighth to abijah 24 11 the ninth to jeshuah the tenth to shecaniah 
24 12 the eleventh to eliashib the twelfth to jakim 24 13 the 
thirteenth to huppah the fourteenth to jeshebeab 24 14 the fifteenth 
to bilgah the sixteenth to immer 24 15 the seventeenth to hezir the 
eighteenth to aph 24 16 the nineteenth to pethahiah the twentieth 
to jehezekel 24 17 the one and twentieth to jachin the two and 
twentieth to gamul 24 18 the three and twentieth to delaiah the four 
and twentieth to maaziah 

24 19 these were the order of them in their servic to come into 
the hou of the lord accord to their manner under aaron their 
father a the lord god of israel had command him 

24 20 and the rest of the son of levi were these of the son of 
amram shubael of the son of shubael jehdeiah 

24 21 concern rehabiah of the son of rehabiah the first wa 
isshiah 

24 22 of the izharit shelomoth of the son of shelomoth jahath 

24 23 and the son of hebron jeriah the first amariah the second 
jahaziel the third jekameam the fourth 

24 24 of the son of uzziel michah of the son of michah shamir 

24 25 the brother of michah wa isshiah of the son of isshiah 
zechariah 

24 26 the son of merari were mahli and mushi the son of jaaziah 
beno 

24 27 the son of merari by jaaziah beno and shoham and zaccur and 
ibri 

24 28 of mahli came eleazar who had no son 

24 29 concern kish the son of kish wa jerahmeel 

24 30 the son also of mushi mahli and eder and jerimoth these 
were the son of the levit after the hou of their father 

24 31 these likewi cast lot over against their brother the son of 
aaron in the presenc of david the king and zadok and ahimelech and 
the chief of the father of the priest and levit even the 
princip father over against their younger brother 

25 1 moreov david and the captain of the host separ to the 
servic of the son of asaph and of heman and of jeduthun who 
should prophesi with harp with psalteri and with cymbal and the 
number of the workman accord to their servic wa 25 2 of the son 
of asaph zaccur and joseph and nethaniah and asarelah the son of 
asaph under the hand of asaph which prophesi accord to the 
order of the king 

25 3 of jeduthun the son of jeduthun gedaliah and zeri and 
jeshaiah hashabiah and mattithiah six under the hand of their 
father jeduthun who prophesi with a harp to give thank and to 
prai the lord 

25 4 of heman the son of heman bukkiah mattaniah uzziel shebuel 
and jerimoth hananiah hanani eliathah giddalti and romamtiez 
joshbekashah mallothi hothir and mahazioth 25 5 all these were the 
son of heman the king s seer in the word of god to lift up the 
horn and god gave to heman fourteen son and three daughter 

25 6 all these were under the hand of their father for song in the 
hou of the lord with cymbal psalteri and harp for the 
servic of the hou of god accord to the king s order to asaph 
jeduthun and heman 

25 7 so the number of them with their brother that were instruct 
in the song of the lord even all that were cun wa two hundr 
fourscor and eight 

25 8 and they cast lot ward against ward a well the small a the 
great the teacher a the scholar 

25 9 now the first lot came forth for asaph to joseph the second to 
gedaliah who with hi brother and son were twelv 25 10 the third 
to zaccur he hi son and hi brother were twelv 25 11 the 
fourth to izri he hi son and hi brother were twelv 25 12 the 
fifth to nethaniah he hi son and hi brother were twelv 25 13 
the sixth to bukkiah he hi son and hi brother were twelv 
25 14 the seventh to jesharelah he hi son and hi brother were 
twelv 25 15 the eighth to jeshaiah he hi son and hi brother 
were twelv 25 16 the ninth to mattaniah he hi son and hi 
brother were twelv 25 17 the tenth to shimei he hi son and 
hi brother were twelv 25 18 the eleventh to azareel he hi 
son and hi brother were twelv 25 19 the twelfth to hashabiah 
he hi son and hi brother were twelv 25 20 the thirteenth to 
shubael he hi son and hi brother were twelv 25 21 the 
fourteenth to mattithiah he hi son and hi brother were twelv 
25 22 the fifteenth to jeremoth he hi son and hi brother were 
twelv 25 23 the sixteenth to hananiah he hi son and hi 
brother were twelv 25 24 the seventeenth to joshbekashah he hi 
son and hi brother were twelv 25 25 the eighteenth to hanani 
he hi son and hi brother were twelv 25 26 the nineteenth to 
mallothi he hi son and hi brother were twelv 25 27 the 
twentieth to eliathah he hi son and hi brother were twelv 
25 28 the one and twentieth to hothir he hi son and hi brother 
were twelv 25 29 the two and twentieth to giddalti he hi son 
and hi brother were twelv 25 30 the three and twentieth to 
mahazioth he hi son and hi brother were twelv 25 31 the four 
and twentieth to romamtiez he hi son and hi brother were 
twelv 

26 1 concern the divi of the porter of the korhit wa 
meshelemiah the son of kore of the son of asaph 

26 2 and the son of meshelemiah were zechariah the firstborn 
jediael the second zebadiah the third jathniel the fourth 26 3 elam 
the fifth jehohanan the sixth elioenai the seventh 

26 4 moreov the son of obededom were shemaiah the firstborn 
jehozabad the second joah the third and sacar the fourth and 
nethaneel the fifth 

26 5 ammiel the sixth issachar the seventh peulthai the eighth for 
god bless him 

26 6 also unto shemaiah hi son were son born that rule throughout 
the hou of their father for they were mighti men of valour 

26 7 the son of shemaiah othni and rephael and obe elzabad 
whose brother were strong men elihu and semachiah 

26 8 all these of the son of obededom they and their son and their 
brother abl men for strength for the servic were threescor and 
two of obededom 

26 9 and meshelemiah had son and brother strong men eighteen 

26 10 also hosah of the child of merari had son simri the 
chief for though he wa not the firstborn yet hi father made him 
the chief 26 11 hilkiah the second tebaliah the third zechariah 
the fourth all the son and brother of hosah were thirteen 

26 12 among these were the divi of the porter even among the 
chief men have ward one against anoth to minist in the hou 
of the lord 

26 13 and they cast lot a well the small a the great accord to 
the hou of their father for everi gate 

26 14 and the lot eastward fell to shelemiah then for zechariah hi 
son a wise counsellor they cast lot and hi lot came out 
northward 

26 15 to obededom southward and to hi son the hou of asuppim 

26 16 to shuppim and hosah the lot came forth westward with the gate 
shallecheth by the causeway of the go up ward against ward 

26 17 eastward were six levit northward four a day southward four 
a day and toward asuppim two and two 

26 18 at parbar westward four at the causeway and two at parbar 

26 19 these are the divi of the porter among the son of kore 
and among the son of merari 

26 20 and of the levit ahijah wa over the treasur of the hou 
of god and over the treasur of the dedic thing 

26 21 a concern the son of laadan the son of the gershonit 
laadan chief father even of laadan the gershonit were jehi 

26 22 the son of jehi zetham and joel hi brother which were 
over the treasur of the hou of the lord 

26 23 of the amramit and the izharit the hebronit and the 
uzzielit 26 24 and shebuel the son of gershom the son of mose 
wa ruler of the treasur 

26 25 and hi brother by eliez rehabiah hi son and jeshaiah hi 
son and joram hi son and zichri hi son and shelomith hi son 

26 26 which shelomith and hi brother were over all the treasur of 
the dedic thing which david the king and the chief father the 
captain over thousand and hundr and the captain of the host 
had dedic 

26 27 out of the spoil won in battl did they dedic to maintain 
the hou of the lord 

26 28 and all that samuel the seer and saul the son of kish and 
abner the son of ner and joab the son of zeruiah had dedic and 
whosoev had dedic ani thing it wa under the hand of shelomith 
and of hi brother 

26 29 of the izharit chenaniah and hi son were for the outward 
busi over israel for offic and judg 

26 30 and of the hebronit hashabiah and hi brother men of 
valour a thousand and seven hundr were offic among them of 
israel on thi side jordan westward in all the busi of the lord 
and in the servic of the king 

26 31 among the hebronit wa jerijah the chief even among the 
hebronit accord to the gener of hi father in the 
fortieth year of the reign of david they were sought for and there 
were found among them mighti men of valour at jazer of gilead 

26 32 and hi brother men of valour were two thousand and seven
