israel 

20 30 so the realm of jehoshaphat wa quiet for hi god gave him rest 
round about 

20 31 and jehoshaphat reign over judah he wa thirti and five year 
old when he began to reign and he reign twenti and five year in 
jerusalem 

and hi mother s name wa azubah the daughter of shilhi 

20 32 and he walk in the way of asa hi father and depart not 
from it do that which wa right in the sight of the lord 

20 33 howbeit the high place were not taken away for a yet the 
peopl had not prepar their heart unto the god of their father 

20 34 now the rest of the act of jehoshaphat first and last behold 
they are written in the book of jehu the son of hanani who is 
mention in the book of the king of israel 

20 35 and after thi did jehoshaphat king of judah join himself with 
ahaziah king of israel who did veri wickedli 20 36 and he join 
himself with him to make ship to go to tarshish and they made the 
ship in eziongab 

20 37 then eliez the son of dodavah of mareshah prophesi against 
jehoshaphat say becau thou hast join thyself with ahaziah 
the lord hath broken thi work and the ship were broken that they 
were not abl to go to tarshish 

21 1 now jehoshaphat slept with hi father and wa buri with hi 
father in the citi of david and jehoram hi son reign in hi 
stead 

21 2 and he had brother the son of jehoshaphat azariah and jehiel 
and zechariah and azariah and michael and shephatiah all these 
were the son of jehoshaphat king of israel 

21 3 and their father gave them great gift of silver and of gold 
and of preciou thing with fenc citi in judah but the kingdom 
gave he to jehoram becau he wa the firstborn 

21 4 now when jehoram wa risen up to the kingdom of hi father he 
strengthen himself and slew all hi brother with the sword and 
diver also of the princ of israel 

21 5 jehoram wa thirti and two year old when he began to reign and 
he reign eight year in jerusalem 

21 6 and he walk in the way of the king of israel like a did the 
hou of ahab for he had the daughter of ahab to wife and he wrought 
that which wa evil in the eye of the lord 

21 7 howbeit the lord would not destroy the hou of david becau of 
the coven that he had made with david and a he promi to give a 
light to him and to hi son for ever 

21 8 in hi day the edomit revolt from under the dominion of 
judah and made themselv a king 

21 9 then jehoram went forth with hi princ and all hi chariot 
with him and he rose up by night and smote the edomit which 
compass him in and the captain of the chariot 

21 10 so the edomit revolt from under the hand of judah unto thi 
day 

the same time also did libnah revolt from under hi hand becau he 
had forsaken the lord god of hi father 

21 11 moreov he made high place in the mountain of judah and 
cau the inhabit of jerusalem to commit fornic and 
compel judah thereto 

21 12 and there came a write to him from elijah the prophet say 
thu saith the lord god of david thi father becau thou hast not 
walk in the way of jehoshaphat thi father nor in the way of asa 
king of judah 21 13 but hast walk in the way of the king of 
israel and hast made judah and the inhabit of jerusalem to go a 
whore like to the whoredom of the hou of ahab and also hast 
slain thi brother of thi father s hou which were better than 
thyself 21 14 behold with a great plagu will the lord smite thi 
peopl and thi child and thi wife and all thi good 21 15 and 
thou shalt have great sick by disea of thi bowel until thi 
bowel fall out by reason of the sick day by day 

21 16 moreov the lord stir up against jehoram the spirit of the 
philistin and of the arabian that were near the ethiopian 21 17 
and they came up into judah and brake into it and carri away all 
the substanc that wa found in the king s hou and hi son also 
and hi wife so that there wa never a son left him save jehoahaz 
the youngest of hi son 

21 18 and after all thi the lord smote him in hi bowel with an 
incur disea 

21 19 and it came to pa that in process of time after the end of 
two year hi bowel fell out by reason of hi sick so he die 
of sore disea and hi peopl made no burn for him like the 
burn of hi father 

21 20 thirti and two year old wa he when he began to reign and he 
reign in jerusalem eight year and depart without be desir 
howbeit they buri him in the citi of david but not in the 
sepulchr of the king 

22 1 and the inhabit of jerusalem made ahaziah hi youngest son 
king in hi stead for the band of men that came with the arabian to 
the camp had slain all the eldest so ahaziah the son of jehoram king 
of judah reign 

22 2 forti and two year old wa ahaziah when he began to reign and 
he reign one year in jerusalem hi mother s name also wa athaliah 
the daughter of omri 

22 3 he also walk in the way of the hou of ahab for hi mother 
wa hi counsellor to do wickedli 

22 4 wherefor he did evil in the sight of the lord like the hou of 
ahab for they were hi counsellor after the death of hi father to 
hi destruct 

22 5 he walk also after their counsel and went with jehoram the son 
of ahab king of israel to war against hazael king of syria at 
ramothgilead and the syrian smote joram 

22 6 and he return to be heal in jezreel becau of the wound 
which were given him at ramah when he fought with hazael king of 
syria and azariah the son of jehoram king of judah went down to see 
jehoram the son of ahab at jezreel becau he wa sick 

22 7 and the destruct of ahaziah wa of god by come to joram for 
when he wa come he went out with jehoram against jehu the son of 
nimshi whom the lord had anoint to cut off the hou of ahab 

22 8 and it came to pa that when jehu wa execut judgment upon 
the hou of ahab and found the princ of judah and the son of the 
brother of ahaziah that minist to ahaziah he slew them 

22 9 and he sought ahaziah and they caught him for he wa hid in 
samaria and brought him to jehu and when they had slain him they 
buri him becau said they he is the son of jehoshaphat who 
sought the lord with all hi heart so the hou of ahaziah had no 
power to keep still the kingdom 

22 10 but when athaliah the mother of ahaziah saw that her son wa 
dead she aro and destroy all the seed royal of the hou of 
judah 

22 11 but jehoshabeath the daughter of the king took joash the son 
of ahaziah and stole him from among the king s son that were slain 
and put him and hi nur in a bedchamb so jehoshabeath the 
daughter of king jehoram the wife of jehoiada the priest for she 
wa the sister of ahaziah hid him from athaliah so that she slew 
him not 

22 12 and he wa with them hid in the hou of god six year and 
athaliah reign over the land 

23 1 and in the seventh year jehoiada strengthen himself and took 
the captain of hundr azariah the son of jeroham and ishmael the 
son of jehohanan and azariah the son of obe and maaseiah the son of 
adaiah and elishaphat the son of zichri into coven with him 

23 2 and they went about in judah and gather the levit out of all 
the citi of judah and the chief of the father of israel and they 
came to jerusalem 

23 3 and all the congreg made a coven with the king in the 
hou of god and he said unto them behold the king s son shall 
reign a the lord hath said of the son of david 

23 4 thi is the thing that ye shall do a third part of you enter 
on the sabbath of the priest and of the levit shall be porter of 
the door 23 5 and a third part shall be at the king s hou and a 
third part at the gate of the foundat and all the peopl shall be 
in the court of the hou of the lord 

23 6 but let none come into the hou of the lord save the priest 
and they that minist of the levit they shall go in for they are 
holi but all the peopl shall keep the watch of the lord 

23 7 and the levit shall compass the king round about everi man 
with hi weapon in hi hand and whosoev el cometh into the 
hou he shall be put to death but be ye with the king when he 
cometh in and when he goeth out 

23 8 so the levit and all judah did accord to all thing that 
jehoiada the priest had command and took everi man hi men that 
were to come in on the sabbath with them that were to go out on the 
sabbath for jehoiada the priest dismiss not the cour 

23 9 moreov jehoiada the priest deliv to the captain of 
hundr spear and buckler and shield that had been king 
david s which were in the hou of god 

23 10 and he set all the peopl everi man have hi weapon in hi 
hand from the right side of the templ to the left side of the 
templ along by the altar and the templ by the king round about 

23 11 then they brought out the king s son and put upon him the 
crown and gave him the testimoni and made him king and jehoiada and 
hi son anoint him and said god save the king 

23 12 now when athaliah heard the noi of the peopl run and 
prai the king she came to the peopl into the hou of the lord 
23 13 and she look and behold the king stood at hi pillar at the 
enter in and the princ and the trumpet by the king and all the 
peopl of the land rejoic and sound with trumpet also the 
singer with instrument of musick and such a taught to sing prai 
then athaliah rent her cloth and said treason treason 

23 14 then jehoiada the priest brought out the captain of hundr 
that were set over the host and said unto them have her forth of the 
rang and whoso followeth her let him be slain with the sword for 
the priest said slay her not in the hou of the lord 

23 15 so they laid hand on her and when she wa come to the enter 
of the hor gate by the king s hou they slew her there 

23 16 and jehoiada made a coven between him and between all the 
peopl and between the king that they should be the lord s peopl 

23 17 then all the peopl went to the hou of baal and brake it 
down and brake hi altar and hi imag in piec and slew mattan 
the priest of baal befor the altar 

23 18 also jehoiada appoint the offic of the hou of the lord by 
the hand of the priest the levit whom david had distribut in the 
hou of the lord to offer the burnt offer of the lord a it is 
written in the law of mose with rejoic and with sing a it 
wa ordain by david 

23 19 and he set the porter at the gate of the hou of the lord 
that none which wa unclean in ani thing should enter in 

23 20 and he took the captain of hundr and the nobl and the 
governor of the peopl and all the peopl of the land and brought 
down the king from the hou of the lord and they came through the 
high gate into the king s hou and set the king upon the throne of 
the kingdom 

23 21 and all the peopl of the land rejoic and the citi wa quiet 
after that they had slain athaliah with the sword 

24 1 joash wa seven year old when he began to reign and he reign 
forti year in jerusalem hi mother s name also wa zibiah of 
beersheba 

24 2 and joash did that which wa right in the sight of the lord all 
the day of jehoiada the priest 

24 3 and jehoiada took for him two wife and he begat son and 
daughter 

24 4 and it came to pa after thi that joash wa mind to repair 
the hou of the lord 

24 5 and he gather togeth the priest and the levit and said to 
them go out unto the citi of judah and gather of all israel money 
to repair the hou of your god from year to year and see that ye 
hasten the matter howbeit the levit hasten it not 

24 6 and the king call for jehoiada the chief and said unto him 
whi hast thou not requir of the levit to bring in out of judah and 
out of jerusalem the collect accord to the command of mose 
the servant of the lord and of the congreg of israel for the 
tabernacl of wit 24 7 for the son of athaliah that wick 
woman had broken up the hou of god and also all the dedic 
thing of the hou of the lord did they bestow upon baalim 

24 8 and at the king s command they made a chest and set it 
without at the gate of the hou of the lord 

24 9 and they made a proclam through judah and jerusalem to 
bring in to the lord the collect that mose the servant of god laid 
upon israel in the wilder 

24 10 and all the princ and all the peopl rejoic and brought in 
and cast into the chest until they had made an end 

24 11 now it came to pa that at what time the chest wa brought 
unto the king s offic by the hand of the levit and when they saw 
that there wa much money the king s scribe and the high priest s 
offic came and empti the chest and took it and carri it to hi 
place again thu they did day by day and gather money in 
abund 

24 12 and the king and jehoiada gave it to such a did the work of the 
servic of the hou of the lord and hire mason and carpent to 
repair the hou of the lord and also such a wrought iron and brass 
to mend the hou of the lord 

24 13 so the workman wrought and the work wa perfect by them and 
they set the hou of god in hi state and strengthen it 

24 14 and when they had finish it they brought the rest of the 
money befor the king and jehoiada whereof were made vessel for the 
hou of the lord even vessel to minist and to offer withal and 
spoon and vessel of gold and silver and they offer burnt 
offer in the hou of the lord continu all the day of 
jehoiada 

24 15 but jehoiada wax old and wa full of day when he die an 
hundr and thirti year old wa he when he die 

24 16 and they buri him in the citi of david among the king 
becau he had done good in israel both toward god and toward hi 
hou 

24 17 now after the death of jehoiada came the princ of judah and 
made obei to the king then the king hearken unto them 

24 18 and they left the hou of the lord god of their father and 
serv grove and idol and wrath came upon judah and jerusalem for 
thi their trespass 

24 19 yet he sent prophet to them to bring them again unto the lord 
and they testifi against them but they would not give ear 

24 20 and the spirit of god came upon zechariah the son of jehoiada 
the priest which stood abov the peopl and said unto them thu 
saith god whi transgress ye the command of the lord that ye 
cannot prosper becau ye have forsaken the lord he hath also 
forsaken you 

24 21 and they conspir against him and stone him with stone at 
the command of the king in the court of the hou of the lord 

24 22 thu joash the king rememb not the kind which jehoiada 
hi father had done to him but slew hi son and when he die he 
said the lord look upon it and requir it 

24 23 and it came to pa at the end of the year that the host of 
syria came up against him and they came to judah and jerusalem and 
destroy all the princ of the peopl from among the peopl and 
sent all the spoil of them unto the king of damascu 

24 24 for the armi of the syrian came with a small compani of men 
and the lord deliv a veri great host into their hand becau they 
had forsaken the lord god of their father so they execut judgment 
against joash 

24 25 and when they were depart from him for they left him in 
great disea hi own servant conspir against him for the blood 
of the son of jehoiada the priest and slew him on hi bed and he 
die and they buri him in the citi of david but they buri him 
not in the sepulchr of the king 

24 26 and these are they that conspir against him zabad the son of 
shimeath an ammonit and jehozabad the son of shimrith a moabitess 

24 27 now concern hi son and the great of the burden laid 
upon him and the repair of the hou of god behold they are 
written in the stori of the book of the king and amaziah hi son 
reign in hi stead 

25 1 amaziah wa twenti and five year old when he began to reign and 
he reign twenti and nine year in jerusalem and hi mother s name 
wa jehoaddan of jerusalem 

25 2 and he did that which wa right in the sight of the lord but not 
with a perfect heart 

25 3 now it came to pa when the kingdom wa establish to him 
that he slew hi servant that had kill the king hi father 

25 4 but he slew not their child but did a it is written in the 
law in the book of mose where the lord command say the 
father shall not die for the child neither shall the child die 
for the father but everi man shall die for hi own sin 

25 5 moreov amaziah gather judah togeth and made them captain 
over thousand and captain over hundr accord to the hou of 
their father throughout all judah and benjamin and he number them 
from twenti year old and abov and found them three hundr thousand 
choic men abl to go forth to war that could handl spear and 
shield 

25 6 he hire also an hundr thousand mighti men of valour out of 
israel for an hundr talent of silver 

25 7 but there came a man of god to him say o king let not the 
armi of israel go with thee for the lord is not with israel to wit 
with all the child of ephraim 

25 8 but if thou wilt go do it be strong for the battl god shall 
make thee fall befor the enemi for god hath power to help and to 
cast down 

25 9 and amaziah said to the man of god but what shall we do for the 
hundr talent which i have given to the armi of israel and the man 
of god answer the lord is abl to give thee much more than thi 

25 10 then amaziah separ them to wit the armi that wa come to 
him out of ephraim to go home again wherefor their anger wa 
greatli kindl against judah and they return home in great anger 

25 11 and amaziah strengthen himself and led forth hi peopl and 
went to the valley of salt and smote of the child of seir ten 
thousand 

25 12 and other ten thousand left aliv did the child of judah 
carri away captiv and brought them unto the top of the rock and 
cast them down from the top of the rock that they all were broken in 
piec 

25 13 but the soldier of the armi which amaziah sent back that they 
should not go with him to battl fell upon the citi of judah from 
samaria even unto bethhoron and smote three thousand of them and 
took much spoil 

25 14 now it came to pa after that amaziah wa come from the 
slaughter of the edomit that he brought the god of the child of 
seir and set them up to be hi god and bow down himself befor 
them and burn incen unto them 

25 15 wherefor the anger of the lord wa kindl against amaziah and 
he sent unto him a prophet which said unto him whi hast thou sought 
after the god of the peopl which could not deliv their own peopl 
out of thine hand 25 16 and it came to pa a he talk with him 
that the king said unto him art thou made of the king s counsel 
forbear whi shouldest thou be smitten then the prophet forbar and 
said i know that god hath determin to destroy thee becau thou 
hast done thi and hast not hearken unto my counsel 

25 17 then amaziah king of judah took advic and sent to joash the 
son of jehoahaz the son of jehu king of israel say come let u 
see one anoth in the face 

25 18 and joash king of israel sent to amaziah king of judah say 
the thistl that wa in lebanon sent to the cedar that wa in lebanon 
say give thi daughter to my son to wife and there pa by a 
wild beast that wa in lebanon and trode down the thistl 

25 19 thou sayest lo thou hast smitten the edomit and thine heart 
lifteth thee up to boast abid now at home whi shouldest thou meddl 
to thine hurt that thou shouldest fall even thou and judah with 
thee 25 20 but amaziah would not hear for it came of god that he 
might deliv them into the hand of their enemi becau they sought 
after the god of edom 

25 21 so joash the king of israel went up and they saw one anoth in 
the face both he and amaziah king of judah at bethshemesh which 
belongeth to judah 

25 22 and judah wa put to the wor befor israel and they fled 
everi man to hi tent 

25 23 and joash the king of israel took amaziah king of judah the son 
of joash the son of jehoahaz at bethshemesh and brought him to 
jerusalem and brake down the wall of jerusalem from the gate of 
ephraim to the corner gate four hundr cubit 

25 24 and he took all the gold and the silver and all the vessel 
that were found in the hou of god with obededom and the treasur 
of the king s hou the hostag also and return to samaria 

25 25 and amaziah the son of joash king of judah live after the death 
of joash son of jehoahaz king of israel fifteen year 

25 26 now the rest of the act of amaziah first and last behold are 
they not written in the book of the king of judah and israel 25 27 
now after the time that amaziah did turn away from follow the lord 
they made a conspiraci against him in jerusalem and he fled to 
lachish but they sent to lachish after him and slew him there 

25 28 and they brought him upon hor and buri him with hi 
father in the citi of judah 

26 1 then all the peopl of judah took uzziah who wa sixteen year 
old and made him king in the room of hi father amaziah 

26 2 he built eloth and restor it to judah after that the king 
slept with hi father 

26 3 sixteen year old wa uzziah when he began to reign and he 
reign fifti and two year in jerusalem hi mother s name also wa 
jecoliah of jerusalem 

26 4 and he did that which wa right in the sight of the lord 
accord to all that hi father amaziah did 

26 5 and he sought god in the day of zechariah who had understand 
in the vision of god and a long a he sought the lord god made him 
to prosper 

26 6 and he went forth and war against the philistin and brake 
down the wall of gath and the wall of jabneh and the wall of ashdod 
and built citi about ashdod and among the philistin 

26 7 and god help him against the philistin and against the 
arabian that dwelt in gurbaal and the mehunim 

26 8 and the ammonit gave gift to uzziah and hi name spread 
abroad even to the enter in of egypt for he strengthen himself 
exceedingli 

26 9 moreov uzziah built tower in jerusalem at the corner gate and 
at the valley gate and at the turn of the wall and fortifi 
them 

26 10 also he built tower in the desert and dig mani well for 
he had much cattl both in the low countri and in the plain 
husbandman also and vine dresser in the mountain and in carmel 
for he love husbandri 

26 11 moreov uzziah had an host of fight men that went out to 
war by band accord to the number of their account by the hand of 
jeiel the scribe and maaseiah the ruler under the hand of hananiah 
one of the king s captain 

26 12 the whole number of the chief of the father of the mighti men 
of valour were two thousand and six hundr 

26 13 and under their hand wa an armi three hundr thousand and 
seven thousand and five hundr that made war with mighti power to 
help the king against the enemi 

26 14 and uzziah prepar for them throughout all the host shield 
and spear and helmet and habergeon and bow and sling to cast 
stone 

26 15 and he made in jerusalem engin invent by cun men to be 
on the tower and upon the bulwark to shoot arrow and great stone 
withal 

and hi name spread far abroad for he wa marvel help till 
he wa strong 

26 16 but when he wa strong hi heart wa lift up to hi 
destruct for he transgress against the lord hi god and went 
into the templ of the lord to burn incen upon the altar of incen 

26 17 and azariah the priest went in after him and with him fourscor 
priest of the lord that were valiant men 26 18 and they withstood 
uzziah the king and said unto him it appertaineth not unto thee 
uzziah to burn incen unto the lord but to the priest the son of 
aaron that are consecr to burn incen go out of the sanctuari 
for thou hast trespass neither shall it be for thine honour from 
the lord god 

26 19 then uzziah wa wroth and had a censer in hi hand to burn 
incen and while he wa wroth with the priest the leprosi even 
rose up in hi forehead befor the priest in the hou of the lord 
from besid the incen altar 

26 20 and azariah the chief priest and all the priest look upon 
him and behold he wa leprou in hi forehead and they thrust him 
out from thenc yea himself hast also to go out becau the lord 
had smitten him 

26 21 and uzziah the king wa a leper unto the day of hi death and 
dwelt in a sever hou be a leper for he wa cut off from the 
hou of the lord and jotham hi son wa over the king s hou 
judg the peopl of the land 

26 22 now the rest of the act of uzziah first and last did isaiah 
the prophet the son of amoz write 

26 23 so uzziah slept with hi father and they buri him with hi 
father in the field of the burial which belong to the king for 
they said he is a leper and jotham hi son reign in hi stead 

27 1 jotham wa twenti and five year old when he began to reign and 
he reign sixteen year in jerusalem hi mother s name also wa 
jerushah the daughter of zadok 

27 2 and he did that which wa right in the sight of the lord 
accord to all that hi father uzziah did howbeit he enter not 
into the templ of the lord and the peopl did yet corruptli 

27 3 he built the high gate of the hou of the lord and on the wall 
of ophel he built much 

27 4 moreov he built citi in the mountain of judah and in the 
forest he built castl and tower 

27 5 he fought also with the king of the ammonit and prevail 
against them and the child of ammon gave him the same year an 
hundr talent of silver and ten thousand measur of wheat and ten 
thousand of barley so much did the child of ammon pay unto him 
both the second year and the third 

27 6 so jotham becam mighti becau he prepar hi way befor the 
lord hi god 

27 7 now the rest of the act of jotham and all hi war and hi 
way lo they are written in the book of the king of israel and 
judah 

27 8 he wa five and twenti year old when he began to reign and 
reign sixteen year in jerusalem 

27 9 and jotham slept with hi father and they buri him in the 
citi of david and ahaz hi son reign in hi stead 

28 1 ahaz wa twenti year old when he began to reign and he reign 
sixteen year in jerusalem but he did not that which wa right in the 
sight of the lord like david hi father 28 2 for he walk in the 
way of the king of israel and made also molten imag for baalim 

28 3 moreov he burnt incen in the valley of the son of hinnom and 
burnt hi child in the fire after the abomin of the heathen 
whom the lord had cast out befor the child of israel 

28 4 he sacrif also and burnt incen in the high place and on 
the hill and under everi green tree 

28 5 wherefor the lord hi god deliv him into the hand of the 
king of syria and they smote him and carri away a great multitud 
of them captiv and brought them to damascu and he wa also 
deliv into the hand of the king of israel who smote him with a 
great slaughter 

28 6 for pekah the son of remaliah slew in judah an hundr and twenti 
thousand in one day which were all valiant men becau they had 
forsaken the lord god of their father 

28 7 and zichri a mighti man of ephraim slew maaseiah the king s 
son and azrikam the governor of the hou and elkanah that wa next 
to the king 

28 8 and the child of israel carri away captiv of their brother 
two hundr thousand woman son and daughter and took also away 
much spoil from them and brought the spoil to samaria 

28 9 but a prophet of the lord wa there whose name wa ode and he 
went out befor the host that came to samaria and said unto them 
behold becau the lord god of your father wa wroth with judah he 
hath deliv them into your hand and ye have slain them in a rage 
that reacheth up unto heaven 

28 10 and now ye purpo to keep under the child of judah and 
jerusalem for bondman and bondwoman unto you but are there not with 
you even with you sin against the lord your god 28 11 now hear me 
therefor and deliv the captiv again which ye have taken captiv 
of your brother for the fierc wrath of the lord is upon you 

28 12 then certain of the head of the child of ephraim azariah 
the son of johanan berechiah the son of meshillemoth and jehizkiah 
the son of shallum and amasa the son of hadlai stood up against them 
that came from the war 28 13 and said unto them ye shall not bring 
in the captiv hither for wherea we have offend against the lord 
alreadi ye intend to add more to our sin and to our trespass for 
our trespass is great and there is fierc wrath against israel 

28 14 so the arm men left the captiv and the spoil befor the 
princ and all the congreg 

28 15 and the men which were express by name rose up and took the 
captiv and with the spoil cloth all that were nake among them 
and array them and shod them and gave them to eat and to drink 
and anoint them and carri all the feebl of them upon as and 
brought them to jericho the citi of palm tree to their brother 
then they return to samaria 

28 16 at that time did king ahaz send unto the king of assyria to 
help him 

28 17 for again the edomit had come and smitten judah and carri 
away captiv 

28 18 the philistin also had invad the citi of the low countri 
and of the south of judah and had taken bethshemesh and ajalon and 
gederoth and shocho with the villag thereof and timnah with the 
villag thereof gimzo also and the villag thereof and they dwelt 
there 

28 19 for the lord brought judah low becau of ahaz king of israel 
for he made judah nake and transgress sore against the lord 

28 20 and tilgathpiln king of assyria came unto him and 
distress him but strengthen him not 

28 21 for ahaz took away a portion out of the hou of the lord and 
out of the hou of the king and of the princ and gave it unto the 
king of assyria but he help him not 

28 22 and in the time of hi distress did he trespass yet more against 
the lord thi is that king ahaz 

28 23 for he sacrif unto the god of damascu which smote him 
and he said becau the god of the king of syria help them 
therefor will i sacrif to them that they may help me but they 
were the ruin of him and of all israel 

28 24 and ahaz gather togeth the vessel of the hou of god and 
cut in piec the vessel of the hou of god and shut up the door 
of the hou of the lord and he made him altar in everi corner of 
jerusalem 

28 25 and in everi sever citi of judah he made high place to burn 
incen unto other god and provok to anger the lord god of hi 
father 

28 26 now the rest of hi act and of all hi way first and last 
behold they are written in the book of the king of judah and israel 

28 27 and ahaz slept with hi father and they buri him in the 
citi even in jerusalem but they brought him not into the sepulchr 
of the king of israel and hezekiah hi son reign in hi stead 

29 1 hezekiah began to reign when he wa five and twenti year old 
and he reign nine and twenti year in jerusalem and hi mother s 
name wa abijah the daughter of zechariah 

29 2 and he did that which wa right in the sight of the lord 
accord to all that david hi father had done 

29 3 he in the first year of hi reign in the first month open the 
door of the hou of the lord and repair them 

29 4 and he brought in the priest and the levit and gather them 
togeth into the east street 29 5 and said unto them hear me ye 
levit sanctifi now yourselv and sanctifi the hou of the lord 
god of your father and carri forth the filthi out of the holi 
place 

29 6 for our father have trespass and done that which wa evil in 
the eye of the lord our god and have forsaken him and have turn 
away their face from the habit of the lord and turn their 
back 

29 7 also they have shut up the door of the porch and put out the 
lamp and have not burn incen nor offer burnt offer in the 
holi place unto the god of israel 

29 8 wherefor the wrath of the lord wa upon judah and jerusalem and 
he hath deliv them to troubl to astonish and to hiss a 
ye see with your eye 

29 9 for lo our father have fallen by the sword and our son and 
our daughter and our wife are in captiv for thi 

29 10 now it is in mine heart to make a coven with the lord god of 
israel that hi fierc wrath may turn away from u 

29 11 my son be not now neglig for the lord hath chosen you to 
stand befor him to serv him and that ye should minist unto him 
and burn incen 

29 12 then the levit aro mahath the son of amasai and joel the 
son of azariah of the son of the kohathit and of the son of 
merari kish the son of abdi and azariah the son of jehalelel and of 
the gershonit joah the son of zimmah and eden the son of joah 
29 13 and of the son of elizaphan shimri and jeiel and of the son 
of asaph zechariah and mattaniah 29 14 and of the son of heman 
jehiel and shimei and of the son of jeduthun shemaiah and uzziel 

29 15 and they gather their brother and sanctifi themselv and 
came accord to the command of the king by the word of the 
lord to clean the hou of the lord 

29 16 and the priest went into the inner part of the hou of the 
lord to clean it and brought out all the unclean that they 
found in the templ of the lord into the court of the hou of the 
lord and the levit took it to carri it out abroad into the brook 
kidron 

29 17 now they began on the first day of the first month to sanctifi 
and on the eighth day of the month came they to the porch of the lord 
so they sanctifi the hou of the lord in eight day and in the 
sixteenth day of the first month they made an end 

29 18 then they went in to hezekiah the king and said we have 
clean all the hou of the lord and the altar of burnt offer 
with all the vessel thereof and the shewbread tabl with all the 
vessel thereof 

29 19 moreov all the vessel which king ahaz in hi reign did cast 
away in hi transgress have we prepar and sanctifi and 
behold they are befor the altar of the lord 

29 20 then hezekiah the king rose earli and gather the ruler of 
the citi and went up to the hou of the lord 

29 21 and they brought seven bullock and seven ram and seven 
lamb and seven he goat for a sin offer for the kingdom and for 
the sanctuari and for judah and he command the priest the son of 
aaron to offer them on the altar of the lord 

29 22 so they kill the bullock and the priest receiv the blood 
and sprinkl it on the altar likewi when they had kill the 
ram they sprinkl the blood upon the altar they kill also the 
lamb and they sprinkl the blood upon the altar 

29 23 and they brought forth the he goat for the sin offer befor 
the king and the congreg and they laid their hand upon them 
29 24 and the priest kill them and they made reconcili with 
their blood upon the altar to make an aton for all israel for 
the king command that the burnt offer and the sin offer should 
be made for all israel 

29 25 and he set the levit in the hou of the lord with cymbal 
with psalteri and with harp accord to the command of 
david and of gad the king s seer and nathan the prophet for so wa 
the command of the lord by hi prophet 

29 26 and the levit stood with the instrument of david and the 
priest with the trumpet 

29 27 and hezekiah command to offer the burnt offer upon the 
altar 

and when the burnt offer began the song of the lord began also 
with the trumpet and with the instrument ordain by david king of 
israel 

29 28 and all the congreg worship and the singer sang and 
the trumpet sound and all thi continu until the burnt 
offer wa finish 

29 29 and when they had made an end of offer the king and all that 
were present with him bow themselv and worship 

29 30 moreov hezekiah the king and the princ command the levit 
to sing prai unto the lord with the word of david and of asaph the 
seer and they sang prai with glad and they bow their head 
and worship 

29 31 then hezekiah answer and said now ye have consecr 
yourselv unto the lord come near and bring sacrif and thank 
offer into the hou of the lord and the congreg brought in 
sacrif and thank offer and a mani a were of a free heart 
burnt offer 

29 32 and the number of the burnt offer which the congreg 
brought wa threescor and ten bullock an hundr ram and two 
hundr lamb all these were for a burnt offer to the lord 

29 33 and the consecr thing were six hundr ox and three 
thousand sheep 

29 34 but the priest were too few so that they could not flay all 
the burnt offer wherefor their brother the levit did help 
them till the work wa end and until the other priest had 
sanctifi themselv for the levit were more upright in heart to 
sanctifi themselv than the priest 

29 35 and also the burnt offer were in abund with the fat of 
the peac offer and the drink offer for everi burnt offer 
so the servic of the hou of the lord wa set in order 

29 36 and hezekiah rejoic and all the peopl that god had prepar 
the peopl for the thing wa done suddenli 

30 1 and hezekiah sent to all israel and judah and wrote letter also 
to ephraim and manasseh that they should come to the hou of the 
lord at jerusalem to keep the passov unto the lord god of israel 

30 2 for the king had taken counsel and hi princ and all the 
congreg in jerusalem to keep the passov in the second month 

30 3 for they could not keep it at that time becau the priest had 
not sanctifi themselv suffici neither had the peopl 
gather themselv togeth to jerusalem 

30 4 and the thing plea the king and all the congreg 

30 5 so they establish a decr to make proclam throughout all 
israel from beersheba even to dan that they should come to keep the 
passov unto the lord god of israel at jerusalem for they had not 
done it of a long time in such sort a it wa written 

30 6 so the post went with the letter from the king and hi princ 
throughout all israel and judah and accord to the command of 
the king say ye child of israel turn again unto the lord god 
of abraham isaac and israel and he will return to the remnant of 
you that are escap out of the hand of the king of assyria 

30 7 and be not ye like your father and like your brother which 
trespass against the lord god of their father who therefor gave 
them up to desol a ye see 

30 8 now be ye not stiffneck a your father were but yield 
yourselv unto the lord and enter into hi sanctuari which he hath 
sanctifi for ever and serv the lord your god that the fierc 
of hi wrath may turn away from you 

30 9 for if ye turn again unto the lord your brother and your 
child shall find compass befor them that lead them captiv so 
that they shall come again into thi land for the lord your god is 
graciou and merci and will not turn away hi face from you if ye 
return unto him 

30 10 so the post pa from citi to citi through the countri of 
ephraim and manasseh even unto zebulun but they laugh them to 
scorn and mock them 

30 11 nevertheless diver of asher and manasseh and of zebulun humbl 
themselv and came to jerusalem 

30 12 also in judah the hand of god wa to give them one heart to do 
the command of the king and of the princ by the word of the 
lord 

30 13 and there assembl at jerusalem much peopl to keep the feast 
of unleaven bread in the second month a veri great congreg 

30 14 and they aro and took away the altar that were in jerusalem 
and all the altar for incen took they away and cast them into the 
brook kidron 

30 15 then they kill the passov on the fourteenth day of the 
second month and the priest and the levit were asham and 
sanctifi themselv and brought in the burnt offer into the 
hou of the lord 

30 16 and they stood in their place after their manner accord to 
the law of mose the man of god the priest sprinkl the blood 
which they receiv of the hand of the levit 

30 17 for there were mani in the congreg that were not 
sanctifi therefor the levit had the charg of the kill of the 
passov for everi one that wa not clean to sanctifi them unto the 
lord 

30 18 for a multitud of the peopl even mani of ephraim and 
manasseh issachar and zebulun had not clean themselv yet did 
they eat the passov otherwi than it wa written but hezekiah 
pray for them say the good lord pardon everi one 30 19 that 
prepareth hi heart to seek god the lord god of hi father though 
he be not clean accord to the purif of the sanctuari 

30 20 and the lord hearken to hezekiah and heal the peopl 

30 21 and the child of israel that were present at jerusalem kept 
the feast of unleaven bread seven day with great glad and the 
levit and the priest prai the lord day by day sing with loud 
instrument unto the lord 

30 22 and hezekiah spake comfort unto all the levit that taught 
the good knowledg of the lord and they did eat throughout the feast 
seven day offer peac offer and make confess to the 
lord god of their father 

30 23 and the whole assembl took counsel to keep other seven day 
and they kept other seven day with glad 

30 24 for hezekiah king of judah did give to the congreg a 
thousand bullock and seven thousand sheep and the princ gave to 
the congreg a thousand bullock and ten thousand sheep and a 
great number of priest sanctifi themselv 

30 25 and all the congreg of judah with the priest and the 
levit and all the congreg that came out of israel and the 
stranger that came out of the land of israel and that dwelt in 
judah rejoic 

30 26 so there wa great joy in jerusalem for sinc the time of 
solomon the son of david king of israel there wa not the like in 
jerusalem 

30 27 then the priest the levit aro and bless the peopl and 
their voic wa heard and their prayer came up to hi holi dwell 
place even unto heaven 

31 1 now when all thi wa finish all israel that were present went 
out to the citi of judah and brake the imag in piec and cut 
down the grove and threw down the high place and the altar out of 
all judah and benjamin in ephraim also and manasseh until they had 
utterli destroy them all then all the child of israel return 
everi man to hi poss into their own citi 

31 2 and hezekiah appoint the cour of the priest and the levit 
after their cour everi man accord to hi servic the priest 
and levit for burnt offer and for peac offer to minist 
and to give thank and to prai in the gate of the tent of the 
lord 

31 3 he appoint also the king s portion of hi substanc for the 
burnt offer to wit for the morn and even burnt offer 
and the burnt offer for the sabbath and for the new moon and 
for the set feast a it is written in the law of the lord 

31 4 moreov he command the peopl that dwelt in jerusalem to give 
the portion of the priest and the levit that they might be 
encourag in the law of the lord 

31 5 and a soon a the command came abroad the child of 
israel brought in abund the firstfruit of corn wine and oil 
and honey and of all the increa of the field and the tith of all 
thing brought they in abundantli 

31 6 and concern the child of israel and judah that dwelt in 
the citi of judah they also brought in the tith of ox and sheep 
and the tith of holi thing which were consecr unto the lord 
their god and laid them by heap 

31 7 in the third month they began to lay the foundat of the heap 
and finish them in the seventh month 

31 8 and when hezekiah and the princ came and saw the heap they 
bless the lord and hi peopl israel 

31 9 then hezekiah question with the priest and the levit 
concern the heap 

31 10 and azariah the chief priest of the hou of zadok answer him 
and said sinc the peopl began to bring the offer into the hou 
of the lord we have had enough to eat and have left plenti for the 
lord hath bless hi peopl and that which is left is thi great 
store 

31 11 then hezekiah command to prepar chamber in the hou of the 
lord and they prepar them 31 12 and brought in the offer and 
the tith and the dedic thing faith over which cononiah 
the levit wa ruler and shimei hi brother wa the next 

31 13 and jehiel and azaziah and nahath and asahel and jerimoth 
and jozabad and eliel and ismachiah and mahath and benaiah were 
over under the hand of cononiah and shimei hi brother at the 
command of hezekiah the king and azariah the ruler of the hou 
of god 

31 14 and kore the son of imnah the levit the porter toward the 
east wa over the freewil offer of god to distribut the 
oblat of the lord and the most holi thing 

31 15 and next him were eden and miniamin and jeshua and shemaiah 
amariah and shecaniah in the citi of the priest in their set 
offic to give to their brother by cour a well to the great a 
to the small 31 16 besid their genealog of male from three year 
old and upward even unto everi one that entereth into the hou of 
the lord hi daili portion for their servic in their charg 
accord to their cour 31 17 both to the genealog of the priest 
by the hou of their father and the levit from twenti year old 
and upward in their charg by their cour 31 18 and to the 
genealog of all their littl one their wife and their son and 
their daughter through all the congreg for in their set offic 
they sanctifi themselv in holi 31 19 also of the son of 
aaron the priest which were in the field of the suburb of their 
citi in everi sever citi the men that were express by name to 
give portion to all the male among the priest and to all that were 
reckon by genealog among the levit 

31 20 and thu did hezekiah throughout all judah and wrought that 
which wa good and right and truth befor the lord hi god 

31 21 and in everi work that he began in the servic of the hou of 
god and in the law and in the command to seek hi god he did 
it with all hi heart and prosper 

32 1 after these thing and the establish thereof sennacherib 
king of assyria came and enter into judah and encamp against the 
fenc citi and thought to win them for himself 

32 2 and when hezekiah saw that sennacherib wa come and that he wa 
purpo to fight against jerusalem 32 3 he took counsel with hi 
princ and hi mighti men to stop the water of the fountain which 
were without the citi and they did help him 

32 4 so there wa gather much peopl togeth who stop all the 
fountain and the brook that ran through the midst of the land 
say whi should the king of assyria come and find much water 
32 5 also he strengthen himself and built up all the wall that wa 
broken and rai it up to the tower and anoth wall without and 
repair millo in the citi of david and made dart and shield in 
abund 

32 6 and he set captain of war over the peopl and gather them 
togeth to him in the street of the gate of the citi and spake 
comfort to them say 32 7 be strong and courag be not 
afraid nor dismay for the king of assyria nor for all the multitud 
that is with him for there be more with u than with him 32 8 with 
him is an arm of flesh but with u is the lord our god to help u 
and to fight our battl and the peopl rest themselv upon the 
word of hezekiah king of judah 

32 9 after thi did sennacherib king of assyria send hi servant to 
jerusalem but he himself laid sieg against lachish and all hi 
power with him unto hezekiah king of judah and unto all judah that 
were at jerusalem say 32 10 thu saith sennacherib king of 
assyria whereon do ye trust that ye abid in the sieg in jerusalem 
32 11 doth not hezekiah persuad you to give over yourselv to die by 
famin and by thirst say the lord our god shall deliv u out of 
the hand of the king of assyria 32 12 hath not the same hezekiah 
taken away hi high place and hi altar and command judah and 
jerusalem say ye shall worship befor one altar and burn incen 
upon it 32 13 know ye not what i and my father have done unto all 
the peopl of other land were the god of the nation of those land 
ani way abl to deliv their land out of mine hand 32 14 who wa 
there among all the god of those nation that my father utterli 
destroy that could deliv hi peopl out of mine hand that your 
god should be abl to deliv you out of mine hand 32 15 now 
therefor let not hezekiah deceiv you nor persuad you on thi 
manner neither yet believ him for no god of ani nation or kingdom 
wa abl to deliv hi peopl out of mine hand and out of the hand 
of my father how much le shall your god deliv you out of mine 
hand 32 16 and hi servant spake yet more against the lord god and 
against hi servant hezekiah 

32 17 he wrote also letter to rail on the lord god of israel and to 
speak against him say a the god of the nation of other land 
have not deliv their peopl out of mine hand so shall not the god 
of hezekiah deliv hi peopl out of mine hand 

32 18 then they cri with a loud voic in the jew speech unto the 
peopl of jerusalem that were on the wall to affright them and to 
troubl them that they might take the citi 

32 19 and they spake against the god of jerusalem a against the god 
of the peopl of the earth which were the work of the hand of man 

32 20 and for thi cau hezekiah the king and the prophet isaiah the 
son of amoz pray and cri to heaven 

32 21 and the lord sent an angel which cut off all the mighti men of 
valour and the leader and captain in the camp of the king of 
assyria so he return with shame of face to hi own land and when 
he wa come into the hou of hi god they that came forth of hi own 
bowel slew him there with the sword 

32 22 thu the lord save hezekiah and the inhabit of jerusalem 
from the hand of sennacherib the king of assyria and from the hand of 
all other and guid them on everi side 

32 23 and mani brought gift unto the lord to jerusalem and present 
to hezekiah king of judah so that he wa magnifi in the sight of 
all nation from thenceforth 

32 24 in those day hezekiah wa sick to the death and pray unto 
the lord and he spake unto him and he gave him a sign 

32 25 but hezekiah render not again accord to the benefit done 
unto him for hi heart wa lift up therefor there wa wrath upon 
him and upon judah and jerusalem 

32 26 notwithstand hezekiah humbl himself for the pride of hi 
heart both he and the inhabit of jerusalem so that the wrath of 
the lord came not upon them in the day of hezekiah 

32 27 and hezekiah had exceed much rich and honour and he made 
himself treasuri for silver and for gold and for preciou stone 
and for spice and for shield and for all manner of pleasant 
jewel 32 28 storeh also for the increa of corn and wine and 
oil and stall for all manner of beast and cote for flock 

32 29 moreov he provid him citi and poss of flock and 
herd in abund for god had given him substanc veri much 

32 30 thi same hezekiah also stop the upper watercour of gihon 
and brought it straight down to the west side of the citi of david 
and hezekiah prosper in all hi work 

32 31 howbeit in the busi of the ambassador of the princ of 
babylon who sent unto him to enquir of the wonder that wa done in 
the land god left him to tri him that he might know all that wa in 
hi heart 

32 32 now the rest of the act of hezekiah and hi good behold 
they are written in the vision of isaiah the prophet the son of amoz 
and in the book of the king of judah and israel 

32 33 and hezekiah slept with hi father and they buri him in the 
chiefest of the sepulchr of the son of david and all judah and the 
inhabit of jerusalem did him honour at hi death and manasseh hi 
son reign in hi stead 

33 1 manasseh wa twelv year old when he began to reign and he 
reign fifti and five year in jerusalem 33 2 but did that which wa 
evil in the sight of the lord like unto the abomin of the 
heathen whom the lord had cast out befor the child of israel 

33 3 for he built again the high place which hezekiah hi father had 
broken down and he rear up altar for baalim and made grove and 
worship all the host of heaven and serv them 

33 4 also he built altar in the hou of the lord whereof the lord 
had said in jerusalem shall my name be for ever 

33 5 and he built altar for all the host of heaven in the two court 
of the hou of the lord 

33 6 and he cau hi child to pa through the fire in the valley 
of the son of hinnom also he observ time and use enchant 
and use witchcraft and dealt with a familiar spirit and with 
wizard he wrought much evil in the sight of the lord to provok him 
to anger 

33 7 and he set a carv imag the idol which he had made in the 
hou of god of which god had said to david and to solomon hi son 
in thi hou and in jerusalem which i have chosen befor all the 
tribe of israel will i put my name for ever 33 8 neither will i ani 
more remov the foot of israel from out of the land which i have 
appoint for your father so that they will take heed to do all that 
i have command them accord to the whole law and the statut and 
the ordin by the hand of mose 

33 9 so manasseh made judah and the inhabit of jerusalem to err 
and to do wor than the heathen whom the lord had destroy befor 
the child of israel 

33 10 and the lord spake to manasseh and to hi peopl but they 
would not hearken 

33 11 wherefor the lord brought upon them the captain of the host of 
the king of assyria which took manasseh among the thorn and bound 
him with fetter and carri him to babylon 

33 12 and when he wa in afflict he besought the lord hi god and 
humbl himself greatli befor the god of hi father 33 13 and 
pray unto him and he wa intreat of him and heard hi 
supplic and brought him again to jerusalem into hi kingdom 
then manasseh knew that the lord he wa god 

33 14 now after thi he built a wall without the citi of david on the 
west side of gihon in the valley even to the enter in at the fish 
gate and compass about ophel and rai it up a veri great height 
and put captain of war in all the fenc citi of judah 

33 15 and he took away the strang god and the idol out of the hou 
of the lord and all the altar that he had built in the mount of the 
hou of the lord and in jerusalem and cast them out of the citi 

33 16 and he repair the altar of the lord and sacrif thereon 
peac offer and thank offer and command judah to serv the 
lord god of israel 

33 17 nevertheless the peopl did sacrif still in the high place 
yet unto the lord their god onli 

33 18 now the rest of the act of manasseh and hi prayer unto hi 
god and the word of the seer that spake to him in the name of the 
lord god of israel behold they are written in the book of the king 
of israel 

33 19 hi prayer also and how god wa intreat of him and all hi 
sin and hi trespass and the place wherein he built high place 
and set up grove and graven imag befor he wa humbl behold 
they are written among the say of the seer 

33 20 so manasseh slept with hi father and they buri him in hi 
own hou and amon hi son reign in hi stead 

33 21 amon wa two and twenti year old when he began to reign and 
reign two year in jerusalem 

33 22 but he did that which wa evil in the sight of the lord a did 
manasseh hi father for amon sacrif unto all the carv imag 
which manasseh hi father had made and serv them 33 23 and humbl 
not himself befor the lord a manasseh hi father had humbl 
himself but amon trespass more and more 

33 24 and hi servant conspir against him and slew him in hi own 
hou 

33 25 but the peopl of the land slew all them that had conspir 
against king amon and the peopl of the land made josiah hi son king 
in hi stead 

34 1 josiah wa eight year old when he began to reign and he reign 
in jerusalem one and thirti year 

34 2 and he did that which wa right in the sight of the lord and 
walk in the way of david hi father and declin neither to the 
right hand nor to the left 

34 3 for in the eighth year of hi reign while he wa yet young he 
began to seek after the god of david hi father and in the twelfth 
year he began to purg judah and jerusalem from the high place and 
the grove and the carv imag and the molten imag 

34 4 and they brake down the altar of baalim in hi presenc and the 
imag that were on high abov them he cut down and the grove and 
the carv imag and the molten imag he brake in piec and made 
dust of them and strow it upon the graf of them that had 
sacrif unto them 

34 5 and he burnt the bone of the priest upon their altar and 
clean judah and jerusalem 

34 6 and so did he in the citi of manasseh and ephraim and simeon 
even unto naphtali with their mattock round about 

34 7 and when he had broken down the altar and the grove and had 
beaten the graven imag into powder and cut down all the idol 
throughout all the land of israel he return to jerusalem 

34 8 now in the eighteenth year of hi reign when he had purg the 
land and the hou he sent shaphan the son of azaliah and maaseiah 
the governor of the citi and joah the son of joahaz the record to 
repair the hou of the lord hi god 

34 9 and when they came to hilkiah the high priest they deliv the 
money that wa brought into the hou of god which the levit that 
kept the door had gather of the hand of manasseh and ephraim and 
of all the remnant of israel and of all judah and benjamin and they 
return to jerusalem 

34 10 and they put it in the hand of the workman that had the 
oversight of the hou of the lord and they gave it to the workman 
that wrought in the hou of the lord to repair and amend the hou 
34 11 even to the artif and builder gave they it to buy hewn 
stone and timber for coupl and to floor the hou which the 
king of judah had destroy 

34 12 and the men did the work faith and the over of them 
were jahath and obadiah the levit of the son of merari and 
zechariah and meshullam of the son of the kohathit to set it 
forward and other of the levit all that could skill of instrument 
of musick 

34 13 also they were over the bearer of burden and were over 
of all that wrought the work in ani manner of servic and of the 
levit there were scribe and offic and porter 

34 14 and when they brought out the money that wa brought into the 
hou of the lord hilkiah the priest found a book of the law of the 
lord given by mose 

34 15 and hilkiah answer and said to shaphan the scribe i have 
found the book of the law in the hou of the lord and hilkiah 
deliv the book to shaphan 

34 16 and shaphan carri the book to the king and brought the king 
word back again say all that wa commit to thi servant they 
do it 

34 17 and they have gather togeth the money that wa found in the 
hou of the lord and have deliv it into the hand of the 
over and to the hand of the workman 

34 18 then shaphan the scribe told the king say hilkiah the 
priest hath given me a book and shaphan read it befor the king 

34 19 and it came to pa when the king had heard the word of the 
law that he rent hi cloth 

34 20 and the king command hilkiah and ahikam the son of shaphan 
and abdon the son of micah and shaphan the scribe and asaiah a 
servant of the king s say 34 21 go enquir of the lord for me 
and for them that are left in israel and in judah concern the 
word of the book that is found for great is the wrath of the lord 
that is pour out upon u becau our father have not kept the word 
of the lord to do after all that is written in thi book 

34 22 and hilkiah and they that the king had appoint went to 
huldah the prophetess the wife of shallum the son of tikvath the son 
of hasrah keeper of the wardrob now she dwelt in jerusalem in the 
colleg and they spake to her to that effect 

34 23 and she answer them thu saith the lord god of israel tell 
ye the man that sent you to me 34 24 thu saith the lord behold i 
will bring evil upon thi place and upon the inhabit thereof 
even all the cur that are written in the book which they have read 
befor the king of judah 34 25 becau they have forsaken me and 
have burn incen unto other god that they might provok me to 
anger with all the work of their hand therefor my wrath shall be 
pour out upon thi place and shall not be quench 

34 26 and a for the king of judah who sent you to enquir of the 
lord so shall ye say unto him thu saith the lord god of israel 
concern the word which thou hast heard 34 27 becau thine heart 
wa tender and thou didst humbl thyself befor god when thou 
heardest hi word against thi place and against the inhabit 
thereof and humbledst thyself befor me and didst rend thi cloth 
and weep befor me i have even heard thee also saith the lord 

34 28 behold i will gather thee to thi father and thou shalt be 
gather to thi grave in peac neither shall thine eye see all the 
evil that i will bring upon thi place and upon the inhabit of 
the same so they brought the king word again 

34 29 then the king sent and gather togeth all the elder of judah 
and jerusalem 

34 30 and the king went up into the hou of the lord and all the men 
of judah and the inhabit of jerusalem and the priest and the 
levit and all the peopl great and small and he read in their 
ear all the word of the book of the coven that wa found in the 
hou of the lord 

34 31 and the king stood in hi place and made a coven befor the 
lord to walk after the lord and to keep hi command and hi 
testimoni and hi statut with all hi heart and with all hi 
soul to perform the word of the coven which are written in thi 
book 

34 32 and he cau all that were present in jerusalem and benjamin to 
stand to it and the inhabit of jerusalem did accord to the 
coven of god the god of their father 

34 33 and josiah took away all the abomin out of all the 
countri that pertain to the child of israel and made all that 
were present in israel to serv even to serv the lord their god and 
all hi day they depart not from follow the lord the god of 
their father 

35 1 moreov josiah kept a passov unto the lord in jerusalem and 
they kill the passov on the fourteenth day of the first month 

35 2 and he set the priest in their charg and encourag them to 
the servic of the hou of the lord 35 3 and said unto the levit 
that taught all israel which were holi unto the lord put the holi 
ark in the hou which solomon the son of david king of israel did 
build it shall not be a burden upon your shoulder serv now the 
lord your god and hi peopl israel 35 4 and prepar yourselv by 
the hou of your father after your cour accord to the 
write of david king of israel and accord to the write of 
solomon hi son 

35 5 and stand in the holi place accord to the divi of the 
famili of the father of your brother the peopl and after the 
divi of the famili of the levit 

35 6 so kill the passov and sanctifi yourselv and prepar your 
brother that they may do accord to the word of the lord by the 
hand of mose 

35 7 and josiah gave to the peopl of the flock lamb and kid all 
for the passov offer for all that were present to the number 
of thirti thousand and three thousand bullock these were of the 
king s substanc 

35 8 and hi princ gave willingli unto the peopl to the priest 
and to the levit hilkiah and zechariah and jehiel ruler of the 
hou of god gave unto the priest for the passov offer two 
thousand and six hundr small cattl and three hundr ox 

35 9 conaniah also and shemaiah and nethaneel hi brother and 
hashabiah and jeiel and jozabad chief of the levit gave unto the 
levit for passov offer five thousand small cattl and five 
hundr ox 

35 10 so the servic wa prepar and the priest stood in their 
place and the levit in their cour accord to the king s 
command 

35 11 and they kill the passov and the priest sprinkl the 
blood from their hand and the levit flay them 

35 12 and they remov the burnt offer that they might give 
accord to the divi of the famili of the peopl to offer 
unto the lord a it is written in the book of mose and so did they 
with the ox 

35 13 and they roast the passov with fire accord to the 
ordin but the other holi offer sod they in pot and in 
caldron and in pan and divid them speedili among all the peopl 

35 14 and afterward they made readi for themselv and for the 
priest becau the priest the son of aaron were busi in offer 
of burnt offer and the fat until night therefor the levit 
prepar for themselv and for the priest the son of aaron 

35 15 and the singer the son of asaph were in their place accord 
to the command of david and asaph and heman and jeduthun the 
king s seer and the porter wait at everi gate they might not 
depart from their servic for their brother the levit prepar for 
them 

35 16 so all the servic of the lord wa prepar the same day to 
keep the passov and to offer burnt offer upon the altar of the 
lord accord to the command of king josiah 

35 17 and the child of israel that were present kept the passov 
at that time and the feast of unleaven bread seven day 

35 18 and there wa no passov like to that kept in israel from the 
day of samuel the prophet neither did all the king of israel keep 
such a passov a josiah kept and the priest and the levit and 
all judah and israel that were present and the inhabit of 
jerusalem 

35 19 in the eighteenth year of the reign of josiah wa thi passov 
kept 

35 20 after all thi when josiah had prepar the templ necho king 
of egypt came up to fight against charchemish by euphrat and josiah 
went out against him 

35 21 but he sent ambassador to him say what have i to do with 
thee thou king of judah i come not against thee thi day but 
against the hou wherewith i have war for god command me to make 
hast forbear thee from meddl with god who is with me that he 
destroy thee not 

35 22 nevertheless josiah would not turn hi face from him but 
disgui himself that he might fight with him and hearken not 
unto the word of necho from the mouth of god and came to fight in 
the valley of megiddo 

35 23 and the archer shot at king josiah and the king said to hi 
servant have me away for i am sore wound 

35 24 hi servant therefor took him out of that chariot and put him 
in the second chariot that he had and they brought him to jerusalem 
and he die and wa buri in one of the sepulchr of hi father 
and all judah and jerusalem mourn for josiah 

35 25 and jeremiah lament for josiah and all the sing men and 
the sing woman spake of josiah in their lament to thi day 
and made them an ordin in israel and behold they are written in 
the lament 

35 26 now the rest of the act of josiah and hi good accord 
to that which wa written in the law of the lord 35 27 and hi deed 
first and last behold they are written in the book of the king of 
israel and judah 

36 1 then the peopl of the land took jehoahaz the son of josiah and 
made him king in hi father s stead in jerusalem 

36 2 jehoahaz wa twenti and three year old when he began to reign 
and he reign three month in jerusalem 

36 3 and the king of egypt put him down at jerusalem and condemn 
the land in an hundr talent of silver and a talent of gold 

36 4 and the king of egypt made eliakim hi brother king over judah 
and jerusalem and turn hi name to jehoiakim and necho took 
jehoahaz hi brother and carri him to egypt 

36 5 jehoiakim wa twenti and five year old when he began to reign 
and he reign eleven year in jerusalem and he did that which wa 
evil in the sight of the lord hi god 

36 6 against him came up nebuchadnezzar king of babylon and bound him 
in fetter to carri him to babylon 

36 7 nebuchadnezzar also carri of the vessel of the hou of the 
lord to babylon and put them in hi templ at babylon 

36 8 now the rest of the act of jehoiakim and hi abomin which 
he did and that which wa found in him behold they are written in 
the book of the king of israel and judah and jehoiachin hi son 
reign in hi stead 

36 9 jehoiachin wa eight year old when he began to reign and he 
reign three month and ten day in jerusalem and he did that which 
wa evil in the sight of the lord 

36 10 and when the year wa expir king nebuchadnezzar sent and 
brought him to babylon with the goodli vessel of the hou of the 
lord and made zedekiah hi brother king over judah and jerusalem 

36 11 zedekiah wa one and twenti year old when he began to reign 
and reign eleven year in jerusalem 

36 12 and he did that which wa evil in the sight of the lord hi god 
and humbl not himself befor jeremiah the prophet speak from the 
mouth of the lord 

36 13 and he also rebel against king nebuchadnezzar who had made 
him swear by god but he stiffen hi neck and harden hi heart 
from turn unto the lord god of israel 

36 14 moreov all the chief of the priest and the peopl 
transgress veri much after all the abomin of the heathen and 
pollut the hou of the lord which he had hallow in jerusalem 

36 15 and the lord god of their father sent to them by hi 
messeng rise up betim and send becau he had compass 
on hi peopl and on hi dwell place 36 16 but they mock the 
messeng of god and despi hi word and misu hi prophet 
until the wrath of the lord aro against hi peopl till there wa 
no remedi 

36 17 therefor he brought upon them the king of the chald who 
slew their young men with the sword in the hou of their sanctuari 
and had no compass upon young man or maiden old man or him that 
stoop for age he gave them all into hi hand 

36 18 and all the vessel of the hou of god great and small and 
the treasur of the hou of the lord and the treasur of the king 
and of hi princ all these he brought to babylon 

36 19 and they burnt the hou of god and brake down the wall of 
jerusalem and burnt all the palac thereof with fire and destroy 
all the goodli vessel thereof 

36 20 and them that had escap from the sword carri he away to 
babylon where they were servant to him and hi son until the reign 
of the kingdom of persia 36 21 to fulfil the word of the lord by the 
mouth of jeremiah until the land had enjoy her sabbath for a 
long a she lay desol she kept sabbath to fulfil threescor and 
ten year 

36 22 now in the first year of cyru king of persia that the word of 
the lord spoken by the mouth of jeremiah might be accomplish the 
lord stir up the spirit of cyru king of persia that he made a 
proclam throughout all hi kingdom and put it also in write 
say 36 23 thu saith cyru king of persia all the kingdom of the 
earth hath the lord god of heaven given me and he hath charg me to 
build him an hou in jerusalem which is in judah who is there among 
you of all hi peopl the lord hi god be with him and let him go up 




ezra 


1 1 now in the first year of cyru king of persia that the word of 
the lord by the mouth of jeremiah might be fulfil the lord stir 
up the spirit of cyru king of persia that he made a proclam 
throughout all hi kingdom and put it also in write say 1 2 
thu saith cyru king of persia the lord god of heaven hath given me 
all the kingdom of the earth and he hath charg me to build him an 
hou at jerusalem which is in judah 

1 3 who is there among you of all hi peopl hi god be with him and 
let him go up to jerusalem which is in judah and build the hou of 
the lord god of israel he is the god which is in jerusalem 

1 4 and whosoev remaineth in ani place where he sojourneth let the 
men of hi place help him with silver and with gold and with good 
and with beast besid the freewil offer for the hou of god 
that is in jerusalem 

1 5 then rose up the chief of the father of judah and benjamin and 
the priest and the levit with all them whose spirit god had 
rai to go up to build the hou of the lord which is in jerusalem 

1 6 and all they that were about them strengthen their hand with 
vessel of silver with gold with good and with beast and with 
preciou thing besid all that wa willingli offer 

1 7 also cyru the king brought forth the vessel of the hou of the 
lord which nebuchadnezzar had brought forth out of jerusalem and had 
put them in the hou of hi god 1 8 even those did cyru king of 
persia bring forth by the hand of mithredath the treasur and 
number them unto sheshbazzar the princ of judah 

1 9 and thi is the number of them thirti charger of gold a 
thousand charger of silver nine and twenti knife 1 10 thirti 
bason of gold silver bason of a second sort four hundr and ten 
and other vessel a thousand 

1 11 all the vessel of gold and of silver were five thousand and four 
hundr all these did sheshbazzar bring up with them of the captiv 
that were brought up from babylon unto jerusalem 

2 1 now these are the child of the provinc that went up out of the 
captiv of those which had been carri away whom nebuchadnezzar 
the king of babylon had carri away unto babylon and came again unto 
jerusalem and judah everi one unto hi citi 2 2 which came with 
zerubbabel jeshua nehemiah seraiah reelaiah mordecai bilshan 
mizpar bigvai rehum baanah the number of the men of the peopl of 
israel 2 3 the child of parosh two thousand an hundr seventi 
and two 

2 4 the child of shephatiah three hundr seventi and two 

2 5 the child of arah seven hundr seventi and five 

2 6 the child of pahathmoab of the child of jeshua and joab 
two thousand eight hundr and twelv 

2 7 the child of elam a thousand two hundr fifti and four 

2 8 the child of zattu nine hundr forti and five 

2 9 the child of zaccai seven hundr and threescor 

2 10 the child of ban six hundr forti and two 

2 11 the child of bebai six hundr twenti and three 

2 12 the child of azgad a thousand two hundr twenti and two 

2 13 the child of adonikam six hundr sixti and six 

2 14 the child of bigvai two thousand fifti and six 

2 15 the child of adin four hundr fifti and four 

2 16 the child of ater of hezekiah nineti and eight 

2 17 the child of bezai three hundr twenti and three 

2 18 the child of jorah an hundr and twelv 

2 19 the child of hashum two hundr twenti and three 

2 20 the child of gibbar nineti and five 

2 21 the child of bethlehem an hundr twenti and three 

2 22 the men of netophah fifti and six 

2 23 the men of anathoth an hundr twenti and eight 

2 24 the child of azmaveth forti and two 

2 25 the child of kirjatharim chephirah and beeroth seven 
hundr and forti and three 

2 26 the child of ramah and gaba six hundr twenti and one 

2 27 the men of michma an hundr twenti and two 

2 28 the men of bethel and ai two hundr twenti and three 

2 29 the child of nebo fifti and two 

2 30 the child of magbish an hundr fifti and six 

2 31 the child of the other elam a thousand two hundr fifti and 
four 

2 32 the child of harim three hundr and twenti 

2 33 the child of lod hadid and ono seven hundr twenti and 
five 

2 34 the child of jericho three hundr forti and five 

2 35 the child of senaah three thousand and six hundr and 
thirti 

2 36 the priest the child of jedaiah of the hou of jeshua 
nine hundr seventi and three 

2 37 the child of immer a thousand fifti and two 

2 38 the child of pashur a thousand two hundr forti and seven 

2 39 the child of harim a thousand and seventeen 

2 40 the levit the child of jeshua and kadmiel of the child 
of hodaviah seventi and four 

2 41 the singer the child of asaph an hundr twenti and eight 

2 42 the child of the porter the child of shallum the 
child of ater the child of talmon the child of akkub the 
child of hatita the child of shobai in all an hundr thirti 
and nine 

2 43 the nethinim the child of ziha the child of hasupha the 
child of tabbaoth 2 44 the child of kero the child of

bazluth the child of mehida the child of harsha 2 53 the

2 54 the child of neziah the child of hatipha
